title: Like-New Blink Outdoor - wireless, weather-resistant HD security camera, two-year battery life, motion detection, set up in minutes – 2 camera kit
inStockText: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.      This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: Like-New Blink Outdoor is refurbished, tested, and certified to look and work like new and comes with the same limited warranty as a new device. Like-New Amazon devices may be packaged in generic Amazon-branded boxes.
Blink Outdoor is a wireless battery-powered HD security camera that helps you monitor your home day or night with infrared night vision.
With long-lasting battery life, Outdoor runs for up to two years on two AA lithium batteries (included).
Store video clips and photos in the cloud with the Blink Subscription Plan and save events locally to the Blink Sync Module 2 via a USB flash drive (sold separately).
Outdoor is built to withstand the elements to help you protect your home inside or out, come rain or shine.
Designed so you can set up yourself in minutes. No wiring, no professional installation required.
Get motion detection alerts on your phone with the option to customize motion zones in the Blink Home Monitor app so you’re only alerted when you need to be.
See, hear, and speak to visitors with live view in real time and two-way audio features on your Blink app.
Works with Alexa – use your voice to monitor your home through supported Alexa-enabled devices.
Includes two Blink Outdoor cameras and one Sync Module 2.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the product functional and easy to set up. They praise its reliability and performance as a brand-new device. Many consider it a great value for the money, with an affordable subscription service. However, some customers dislike the motion detection feature. There are mixed opinions on camera quality, picture quality, battery life, and night vision.

aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
4K Digital Camera for Photograpy Vlogging camera for YouTube 
This camera uses the latest & advanced CMOS chip, helping you take & record the most exciting moments in 48 MP quality images & 4K Ultra HD quality videos. Supports 16x Digital Zoom, allowing you to easily zoom in or out by pressing the W/T button during video recording and for taking still images.
This 4k vlogging camera has a 3'' 180°Flip LCD Screen, you can see what you are recording or the picture framing while doing self vlogging.
This vlogging camera supports Auto-Focus, it is faster, clearer and more accurate to capture the subject you want, and almost unaffected even in strong light environment.
Built-in Flash to help you take high quality pictures even in low light & dark settings, ideal for indoors outdoors.
INCLUDED BATTERY CHARGING STAND, No need to charge the battery with a camera, easier to charge a spare battery by charging stand , the charging stand is carried anywhere in your handbags or pocket.
Webcam Function & HDMI Output : This compact camera can be used as a Webcam, perfect for video calling, live streaming, blogging, vlogging, online teaching, etc. This 4k digital camera also has a option of HD output for playing back the videos on TV.
This compact digital camera is equipped with many features such as anti-shake, continuous shooting, time-lapse shooting, slow motion, motion detection, self-timer, time stamp ON/OFF, webcam function and HD output, making this camera for all indoors/outdoors situations.
4K Ultra HD Video Camera & 48MP & 16X 
Take & record the most exciting moments in 48 MP quality images & 4K Ultra HD quality videos. 
Supports 16x Digital Zoom, allowing you to easily zoom in or out by pressing the W/T button
Support Auto-Focus & Anti-Shake 
This digital camera supports Auto- Focus, it is faster, clearer and more accurate to capture the subject you want.
Adopts anti-shake technology to improve high-precision stabilization while shooting.
Portable Vlogging Camera with Flip screen 
The durable lanyard included attaches to the camera, allowing you to easily loop it around their wrist to prevent the camera from falling.
The camera bag included keeps your camera safe and easily portable.
Self-timer & Selfie Shooting 
This 4k camera can do time delay shooting of 2s /5s /10s according to your needs.
Auto off function conserves battery life. Camera can be set to turn off after 1 minute, 3 minutes or 5 minutes of inactivity.
Face and Smile Detection 
This 4k video camera for Youtube has advanced auto face and smile recognition features, ensuring you capture the best images.
This Point and shoot camera is very easy to use and creates quality images and videos.
2 Charging Options Available 
The versatile battery charging stand is ready to keep your camera charged for any adventure. Plug it in to an outlet at home or even a powerbank on the go with the USB cord.
The charging stand can be carried anywhere in your handbags or pocket, ideal for travel or other indoor/outdoor activities
Multifunctional 4K Camera for photography 
Video Resolution: 4K/2.7K/1080P/720P
Image Resolution: 48M; 44M; 36M; 24M; 20M; 16M; 12M; 10M; 7M-Wide; 5M; 3M; 2M-Wide
Memory Card: 32GB SD memory card included, 4GB to 128GB Class10 U1 was Recommended(Maximum Support 128GB)
Display Screen: 3 inches 180° IPS Flip Screen
File format: Photo/JPG ,Video/AVI

Time-lapse ,Slow motion, Continuous shooting ,Anti-shake ,Smile & Face detection, Beauty face, Selfie, Flash Light(ON/OFF) , Self-timer(2S/5S/10S) , Beauty Face
Does This 4K Camera Have the Ability to Take B&W Pics? ： YES. You can take regular pictures as well as black and white, red, green, blue, and other fun filters you can choose.
What kind of tripod is it suitable for? : There is a Standard 1/4 Inch Tripod Mount Screw at the bottom of this 4K digital camera.
This Camera’s SD Slot is micro SD card Slot (32GB Micro SD card included). If you want to transfer or download the photos/videos to computer, use the included USB cable. You will see the camera's files on your computer and you can also transfer the files to your phones by your computer).
Package List: 1 X 4K Digital Camera; 1 X 32GB SD Card; 1 X Lens Film; 2 x Rechargeable batteries; 1 x Battery Charging Stand; 1 x Lens Cap ;1 x HDMI Cable; 1 x USB Cable; 1 x Adapter; 1 x Camera Pouch; 1 x lens/LCD screen cleaning cloth; 1 x Camera Wrist Strap; 1 x User Manual
Applicable Users : camera for teens boys, camera for teens girls, digital camera for starters, digital camera for seniors, digital camera for students, digital camera for travelers(Compact and easy to carry around ,Indoor & Outdoor), and so on.
Ideal for Birthday, Christmas, New Year, Back to School( For school photography projects), Graduation Ceremony, Wedding Anniversary, ect, Perfect for Indoor/Outdoor Shooting/Recording.
Warm Tips: 
When you use this digital camera for the first time, please read the manual carefully and format the memory card with this camera.
Don't mistakenly click on the format options during using. Once the SD card is formatted, you should not format it again. (Only format new SD cards for the cameras use the first time)
As a suggestion, you’d better backup the photos to your computer from time to time.
If you want to reformat the SD card, it is recommended to backup your pictures on a computer first because reformatting will erase any pictures remaining.
This 4k vlogging camera is suitable for beginners and amateurs rather than professional users.

title: Blink Mini 2 (newest model), Plug-in smart security camera, HD night view in color, built-in spotlight, two-way audio, motion detection, Works with Alexa (Black)
inStockText: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.      This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: Mini 2 is our second generation plug-in smart security camera that helps you stay connected to what’s happening in your home, right from your smartphone.

See and speak from the Blink app — Experience 1080p HD live view, night view in color with a built-in spotlight, a wider field of view, and crisp two-way audio. Stream live video continuously for up to 90 minutes with a Blink Subscription Plan (sold separately).
Outdoor use — Plug in Mini 2 outside your home with the Blink Weather Resistant Power Adapter (sold separately or as part of a bundle) and mount with the included kit.
Motion detection — Get real-time motion alerts on your smartphone so you can react and engage from anywhere.
Smart notifications — Get intelligent alerts including person detection with embedded computer vision (CV) as part of an optional Blink Subscription Plan (sold separately).
Easy set up — Install your camera in just minutes to help provide full home coverage.
Doorbell chime — Use Mini 2 as a plug-in chime for Blink Video Doorbell (sold separately). Hear a real-time alert from Mini 2 when someone presses your Blink Video Doorbell.
Save and share clips — Choose to store events in the cloud with a free 30-day trial of the Blink Subscription Plan or locally with a Sync Module (each sold separately).
Works with Alexa — Connect to an Alexa-enabled device to engage live view, arm and disarm your system, and more using your voice.
Includes one Blink Mini 2 camera, mounting kit including stand, USB cable, and power adapter.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Zostuic NEWEST 4K CAMERA 
Digital Camera for Photography and Video 
--A Partner to Record Travel & Life-- 
The first versatile point and shoot digital camera for beginners, 48 megapixels, 4K resolution, has an 8MP CMOS color sensor and a 3-inch flip screen to capture details! 
A 32G card and 2 rechargeable batteries to save shopping time without worrying about battery power! 
Image:48M/ 44M/ 36M/ 24M/ 20M/16M... 
Video:4K/2.7K/1080P FULL HD/720P HD... 
Let Zostuic celebrate New Year's Christmas, Thanksgiving and everyday with you, and capture the warm and wonderful moments of the holiday! 
AUTOFOCUS DIGITAL CAMERA 
Digital Camera for Clearer Photos 
How to take clear photos? 
1) Choose a bright light place. 
2) Use the flash in the darker. 
3) Half-press the shutter to autofocus. 
Autofocus Camera: Say goodbye to macro blur, you can quickly adjust to take clearer photos during shooting! 
VIDEO CAMERA WITH ANTI-SHAKE 
Vlogging Camera with Pause Fuction 
4K Digital Camera: the recording process can be paused and resumed, save time, and then re-shoot, giving full play to your creativity! 
Video Mode: Loop, slow motion, timestamp! 
Selfie Camera WITH 180° FLIP SCREEN 
Unlock More Features of Vlogging Camera 
Bright Flash, YouTube vlogging, time-lapse(2/5/10S), Continuous shooting, loop, face & smile detection, multiple filter options, 16X digital zoom, select portrait/landscape/beach/party mode... 
TRANSFER AND WEBCAM 
Download Photo/Video to Computer 
Using a card reader to transfer your phones or computer (if not Windows system).
Using the USB(Type-c) cable to connect the computer, select "MSDC" and press OK!(Compatible with Windows system)
As Webcam:Use the USB(Type-c) cable to connect the computer, select "PC" and press OK!
Warm Tip: Due to individual differences in phones and computer, so you maybe need to have a corresponding adapter according to your needs. 
Celebrating New Year Activities Such as Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving... 
3-Inch True Color Digital Camera 
Let Zostuic celebrate New Year's Christmas, Thanksgiving and everyday with you, and capture the warm and wonderful moments of the holiday! 
Who is suitable to use this vlogging camera? 
It can be used by people over 6 years old. Whether it is adults beginners, teens, seniors or college students it is easy to use, easy to operate, and comes with a full range of functions. 
Is compact travel point and shoot digital camera suitable to carry? 
Yes! The palm-sized 0.59lbs compact travel camera features a anti-drop strap to keep your hands free from soreness while shooting long hours, and it can also be kept in your bag. 
Warm Tips: 
1.4K camera compatible with 4-128GB SD card, please format the card before use the camera first. 
2.Please fully charge the battery before first time using this digital camera. 
3.Make sure there is the card in the camera before use. 
Note: When you have any questions, you can click ask question, we will answer you as soon as possible.

title: AOSU 3K/5MP Solar Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, Ultra-Wide-Angle, Cam-to-Cam Track & Sync, Home Security System with Color Night Vision, Spotlight Smart Alarm, No Subscription, 2.4G & 5G WiFi
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video Surveillance › Surveillance Cameras › Bullet Cameras
features: Clearer, Sharper: 3K/5MP resolution offers a 40% clearer image than 2K. Capture crystal-clear faces and license plates so you know exactly who is coming and going. The spotlight of this aosu outdoor security camera leaves no detail unseen and ensures vibrant and clear night vision. Ideal for nighttime security and enhancing object recognition precision.

Complete Coverage: Cover every corner with the 166° ultra-wide angle lens that eliminates blind spots. Advanced image correction technology provides a more accurate and expansive view of your property. You will feel safer with this solar camera outdoor wireless system.

Intelligent Camera-to-Camera Track & Sync: Welcome to smarter security with aosu's system that automatically tracks and syncs events across multiple cameras for effortless review. From front door to garage, from porch to backyard, what happens around your house will be strung together by this solar wireless security camera system.

No Monthly Fees, No Hidden Fees: Enjoy peace of mind with the built-in 32GB local storage, which provides playback, encrypted video data, and video downloads of up to 120 days. (Optional Cloud service available.)

Wireless Flexibility & Solar-Powered Independence: Eliminate the hassle of wired installation and install wherever you need. With just a few hours of direct sunlight and built-in battery, you'll get all-day, all-night power.

Flexible Solar Panel: You don't have to install both the surveillance camera and the solar panel in the sunlight. Wireless outdoor security camera can be mounted in sheltered location for longer service life, while the solar panel can be installed flexibly under the sun.

Effortless Installation and Easy Setup: Experience the convenience of a 2-minute installation with its compact size and wire-free design. This outdoor security camera wireless system has no wiring or professional technical required.

One-Tap Convenience Control: Enable preset custom modes with a single click. When you are leaving home or just coming back, control the working status of multiple outdoor home security cameras with just one click on the aosu App. Switch security settings effortlessly so it can sync with your lifestyle.
Integrated Smart Alarm: The outdoor wireless security camera features smart spotlight and powerful siren to deter unwelcome visitors and provide an extra layer of security.

Best Support: AOSU provides 24 hours quick respond. If you have any questions about this solar wireless security camera system, or if you are not 100% satisfied with this camera system, please contact AOSU firstly, we will provide the best support to you.

Does it support 2.4G/5Ghz dual band WiFi? 
It is compatible with 2.4G/5G WiFi router when setting up. Homebase is connected to the router with an ethernet cable, and solar cameras actually receive signal from the homebase, which provides longer signal coverage and more stable transmission. 
Is it 24/7 continues recording? 
This AOSU solar-powered security camera system records events only when motion is detected, it doesn't record when nothing is happening. 
Does it has any fees for recording and any other features? 
Homebase offers 32GB for local storage. Around 120 days of loop recording for 2-Cam kit, 60 days for 4-Cam kit. No need to buy SD card. No hidden fees. If not enough, you can optionally purchase cloud storage(not mandatory). 
What's the difference between 5MP and 2K? 
5MP has ultra-high-definition pixels and accurate color reproduction allowing you to see more true colors and perfect details. 40% Improvement over 2K. 
Is 166° a fixed viewing angle? 
YES, 166° fixed viewing angle. Please know other bullet and dome security cameras are only fixed 100°-110°, even the clear viewing angle of human eyes is only 150°.

title: Fujifilm X-H2S Mirrorless Camera Body - Black
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Digital Cameras › Mirrorless Cameras
description: X-H2S offers a powerful and versatile combination of photographic and filmmaking features to enhance any storyteller’s vision. Central to its success are the 26.1-megapixel, back-illuminated X-Trans 5 stacked sensor and X-Processor 5, which combine to provide a 14-stop dynamic range and outstanding performance in all lighting conditions. For motion professionals, there is a wealth of 6.2K 30P full sensor 3:2 recording options, which includes internal 10-bit 4:2:2 Apple ProRes and external Apple ProRes RAW and Blackmagic RAW, all with an electronic shutter capable of making images at 40 frames-per-second, with up to 7-stops of in-body image stabilization, and with an AI-powered advanced autofocus system designed to ensure that performance-seeking stills photographers will also not be disappointed.
features: X-H2S is the first X Series camera to feature the 26.1-megapixel, X-Trans 5 stacked back-illuminated sensor. The unique X-Trans color filter array that minimizes moiré and false colors, placing the sensor’s circuitry on a separate layer from the pixels delivers outstanding image quality thanks to expanded low light capabilities and up to 14-stops of dynamic range. The new X-Processor 5, offers lightning-fast performance for the most demanding situations. Capable of handling vast amounts of data, X-Processor 5 delivers next-level performance enhancements in video and stills processing capabilities and intelligent autofocus functionality that’s 3x faster than Fujifilm’s preceding X-T4 model.

Powerful video features make X-H2S a go-to device – both for hybrid image makers and dedicated motion professionals. Up to 90 minutes of footage can be internally recorded with a single battery, at a wide range of resolutions and frame rates up to 6.2K/30P in Open Gate 3:2, 4K/120P, and Full HD/240P. This delivers unparalleled flexibility within the X Series lineup. Additionally, the ability to record 10-bit 4:2:2 Apple ProRes footage internally to CFexpress Type B memory cards offers incredible post-production flexibility, while the X-Trans 5 sensor’s 14-stop dynamic range optimizes the level of image detail across a uniquely wide exposure range.

The autofocusing system in X-H2S is not only quick, but also highly advanced. Capable of working in light levels down to -7EV and keeping up with both fast and erratically moving subjects, it now features Subject Detection autofocus, utilizing AI to deliver an unmatched autofocus performance. Previous X Series models offer Face and Eye Detection AF, X-H2S’s Subject Detection AF broadens the range of identifiable subjects to further enhance focusing accuracy. The new system can identify and track cars, planes, trains, motorcyclists, birds, horses, dogs, cats and more. Furthermore, face and eye detection capabilities have been expanded to pick up hairlines, glasses, and face coverings.

X-H2S delivers powerful performance, suitable for any professional photographer or filmmaker. Continuous shooting is possible at 15 frames-per-second with the mechanical shutter, and up to 40 frames-per-second when the electronic shutter is deployed. These impressive speeds are backed up by the camera’s high-capacity buffer, which allows unlimited continuous recording and writing of JPEG and RAW files to a high-speed memory card when using the mechanical shutter. Creative possibilities abound with by the camera’s in-body image stabilization system, offering up to seven stops of shake reduction to give the handheld user true versatility.

In addition to a wide range of internal video recording features, X-H2S provides significant flexibility for external recording. F-Log or F-Log2, Apple ProRes RAW and Blackmagic RAW footage can all be recorded to an external device through the camera’s standard, Type A HDMI port. Unlock the full capability of X-H2S’s unmatched image quality by recording F-Log or F-Log2 in resolutions of up to 6.2K in Apple ProRes RAW1 and Blackmagic RAW2 . 1 Atomos Ninja V+ HDR Monitor Recorder Required 2 Blackmagic Design Video Assist Monitor Required

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
X-H2S 
Never miss a decisive moment 
Featuring a stunning 5th generation X-Trans CMOS 5 HS sensor and X-Processor 5 in a beautifully designed body, photographers and filmmakers alike can now create at the pace of life and the speed of their imaginations. 
5th generation sensor and processor 
26.1-megapixel illuminated sensor 
A brand new 26.1 megapixel imaging sensor combines our existing back-side illuminated technology with a stacked, layered structure that quadruples readout speeds for faster image processing capabilities. 
Two-times faster than X-Processor 4 
Two-times faster than X-Processor 4, which doubles the processing speed of the camera 
High-speed burst shooting 
Capable of blackout-free bursts of up to 40 frames-per-second. In burst mode, the sensor’s phase-detection pixels are controlled independently. 
Improved autofocus 
An improved AF prediction algorithm provides a major boost to subject tracking and autofocus accuracy on moving objects. 
Subject-Detection Autofocus 
Automatically tracks a broader range of subjects, animals, birds, cars, motorcycles, bicycles, airplanes, and trains – as well as human faces & eyes. 
7.0 stops IBIS 
An all-new 5-axis in-body image stabilization system, and a sensing control function, provides up to 7.0 stops of compensation. 
Open Gate 6.2k/30P 4:2:2 10bit 
Open Gate 6.2k movies can be recorded internally at 30p in 4:2:2 10-bit color. 
4K/120P High-Speed Recording 
X-H2S also supports 4K/120P high-speed video. Now, fast-moving subjects can be recorded in incredible detail for high-quality, slow-motion footage. 
Continuous recording 
Features a new heat-dissipating structure, increasing the video recording time up to 240 minutes of 4K/60P video. 
RAW output via HDMI 
The RAW video output from the X-H2S can be recorded as 12-bit Apple ProRes RAW at frame sizes up to 6.2K and frame rates up to 29.97fps. 
Previous page
Next page
X-H2S Specification 
Resolution 	26.1 megapixel 	
Sensor Style/Type 	APS-C, X-Trans CMOS 5 HS with primary color filter 	
Image Size 	6240 x 4160 pixels 	
ISO range 	ISO 160-12,800 (expandable to ISO 80-51,200) 	
Metering System 	TTL 256-zone with multi, spot, average & centre-weighted options 	
Shutter Range 	15mins-1/8000sec (mechanical). 15mins-1/32,000sec (electronic) 	
Continuous Shooting 	Approx 15fps when using mechanical shutter at full resolution. Approx 40fps when using electronic shutter. 	
Exposure Mode 	PASM 	
Exposure Compensation 	-5.0EV ~ +5.0EV ~ 1/3EV step (Movie -2.0EV ~ +2.0EV 1/3EV step) 	
Monitor 	3.0 inch vari-angle Touch Screen Color LCD Monitor 	
Focusing 	Intelligent Hybrid AF (TTL contrast AF / TTL phase detection AF) with single, continuous, or manual options. 	
Video 	6.2K(3:2) (6240 x 4160)/29.97p at up to 720Mbps 	
Connectivity 	Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, USB-C, HDMI micro Type D, 3.5mm microphone, 2.5mm remote, flash sync and hot shoe 	
Storage Media 	SD, SDHC, SDXC or CFexpress Type B Card (-2TB) cards (dual slots) with support for UHS-I and II 	
Dimensions 	(WXHXD) 136.3x92.9x84.6mm 	
Weight 	660g (with battery and card)

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Jukanur 1080P 44MP Digital Camera - Your Kids' First Digital Camera for Photography 
FHD 1080P 44MP Kid's Digital Camera 
With FHD 1080P video resolution and a remarkable 44MP image resolution, along with the latest CMOS chip, you can record your most exciting and memorable moments with high clarity. 
Almighty Digital Camera 
Equipped with a range of features, including 16X digital zoom, Anti-shake, face and smile detection, white balance, continuous shooting, self-timer, video recording with pause functionality, and 20 different filters, this 2024 NEWEST digital camera is an ideal choice for those interested in simple yet creative photography. 
Your First Choice As a Gift 
With its stylish appearance and palm-sized compact shape, as well as super-easy-to-operate features, this almighty digital camera is a perfect gift for kids, teens, students, beginners, and the elderly. 
HOW EASY TO USE? 
Just insert the micro SD card and battery into the slots and press the ''ON'' Button in only 1 second, format the SD card and then all done, you can capture and record your good times immediately. 
16X Digital Zoom 
Use the 16x digital zoom to get closer to your subjects and make sure you don't miss any detail. 
Fill-Light 
With a built-in flash light, it allows you to take clear pictures even in low light conditions. 
Various Filter Effects 
20 kinds of filter effects to take Vintage photos, Black/White photos, making your pictures more creative and vivid. 
1080P Digital Video Camera-Record all Your Life's Moments! 
Enjoy video recording in stunning 1080P FHD quality and viewback with the 2.5-inch IPS LCD screen, Ideal for recording all of your life's memorable moments! Plus, the pause function lets you start immediately wherever you are left during video recording with only one file. 
Specification: 
Video:1080P / 720P / 480P 
Image: 44MP/ 42MP/ 36MP/ 24MP...... 
Auto Power-Off: 1min/ 3 min/ 5min/ 10min/ Off 
File format: image format: JPG, Video format: AVI 
White Balance: Auto/Daylight/Cloudy/Fluorescent /Tungsten 
Memory Card: TF card, Supports U1 Class 10 max up to 32 GB TF Card 
Date/Time Imprint: Yes, On/Off 
Anti-Shake 
Effectively prevent a handshake issue and make the image you’re taking clear and stable. 
Self Timer 
Set a delay of 2 sec, 5 sec, or 10 sec before the camera starts capturing pictures. 
Continuous Shooting 
Capture a series of photos in quick succession, it is easier to capture your best moments and never miss a single shot. 
Webcam for Streaming 
Connect the camera to the computer, press “Shutter” and “Power” button at the same time, then the camera will automatically enable webcam mode for all your video calling and live streaming needs. 
Portable and Lightweight 
The small travel camera has a super compact shape, makes it perfect everyday and takes the camera everywhere. With 2 lanyards, it is easy for kids to hold or carry conveniently and prevent from unexpected dropping. 
Contains Everything You Need 
No need to purchase other accessories, it comes with everything you need ensuring you can use it right out of the box. 
Perfect Gift for Boys and Girls for Birthdays, Christmas, Graduation Ceremony, Important Holidays, etc. 
How to Download the Files? 
When the camera is ON, connect the camera with your computer via the USB cable, then you can download files easily. 
Or Put the memory card into a card reader(Not Included) and plug the card reader into a computer to start the downloading. 
How to format the memory card? 
In the image mode, press the "Menu"button to enter setting interface, and then scroll down to select "Format" option to format the memory card. 
How to enable the Flash? 
In the image mode, simply press "UP" button of the menu. 
How to set Date and Time stamp? 
Press the "Setting" button, then scroll down to select "date" to enable it or set the exact date time. 
Warm Tips: 
1. Please format the memory card at the first time and use the supplied memory card and USB charging cable. 
2. Please fully charge the battery before first time using this digital camera. 
3.We recommend this digital camera to 5-12 years old kids who are interested in photography, not for the professional. 
4. For any questions, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support for help, we usually respond to your consult less than 12 hours and offer you a hassle-free 18-month free return or replacement.

modules.text:
How to Download the Files? 
When the camera is ON, connect the camera with your computer via the USB cable, then you can download files easily. 
Or Put the memory card into a card reader(Not Included) and plug the card reader into a computer to start the downloading. 
How to format the memory card? 
In the image mode, press the "Menu"button to enter setting interface, and then scroll down to select "Format" option to format the memory card. 
How to enable the Flash? 
In the image mode, simply press "UP" button of the menu. 
How to set Date and Time stamp? 
Press the "Setting" button, then scroll down to select "date" to enable it or set the exact date time. 
Warm Tips:

2. Please fully charge the battery before first time using this digital camera. 
3.We recommend this digital camera to 5-12 years old kids who are interested in photography, not for the professional.

title: ARENTI Split-Screen Baby Monitor 2 Cameras, Audio Monitor with Two 2K UHD WiFi Cameras,720P 5" Color Display,Night Vision,Cry Detection,Motion Detection,Temp&Humidity Sensor,Two Way Talk,App Control
breadCrumbs: Baby Products › Safety › Monitors › Video Monitors
features: Easy Installation & Dual Usage: Enjoy plug-and-play convenience with two options for use. At home, use the LCD screen without networking within a range of 1000ft. When you're out, remotely control the camera with the mobile app. Our hopping and digital encryption technology ensures security and reliability. Please note that the camera needs to be connected to the same 2.4G network as the mobile app during the first-time setup.

360° View & Multiple Detection Modes: Our AInanny baby monitor offers a 360° wide field of view with 100° of the lens, 355° of horizontal rotation, and 60° of vertical rotation. You can remotely rotate the camera through the LCD screen or mobile app. The camera can detect human bodies, crying, and specific areas, with adjustable sensitivity. It also supports temperature and humidity detection. AINanny sends a message to your phone as soon as it detects abnormal movement or sound.

High-Resolution & Enhanced Night Vision: Our AInanny Baby monitor features a 5-inch 720p resolution high-quality color LCD screen with a 4x magnification function. It shows a sharp picture with 10 times more detail than ordinary 240p baby monitors. When you're out, you can watch or remotely control the camera through the free mobile app, which provides 2K resolution video. You can see your little one's delicate movements clearly.

Upgraded Protection & Caring:The baby monitor with 2 cameras With cry & sound detection, motion & danger zone detection,auto traking,temp.& humidity detection and feeding reminders, this monitor offers additional layers of security. With advanced FHSS encryption technology, it supports browsing records checking and user connection control to ensure your safety and privacy.So you can rest assured that you're the only one who can hear and see your baby

Clear Two-Way Audio & Smart Features: AInanny has a built-in mic and speaker for smooth talk with your baby or pets anytime, anywhere. You can also play soothing sounds and lullabies. It supports temperature and humidity detection, volume control, nursing reminders, and click-to-call. You can set, monitor, and control all your cameras in one app and invite your family, friends, or anyone you care about to download the app and share your precious moments. Sharing can be canceled at any time.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Arenti is aiming to offer global users easier, safer, and smarter home security products with the perfect combination of cutting-edge design, advanced technology & user-friendly functions. 
AInanny is the best gift to helping novice parents and newborns through critical periods. 
Previous page
Next page
1 App&Monitor Control 2 Smart Detection 3 VOX Mode 4 360° View 5 One Click to Talk 
More about the camera 
1-Clear sight, day and night 
The baby camera supports 3MP(max) resolution on the app. Due to the invisible design, the night vision effect is enhanced without affecting the baby's sleep. 
2-360° View, protect your baby 
The baby camera has a 105° wide-angle enhanced lens, combined with a 355° horizontal and 60° vertical rotation range, protecting the baby in 360 degrees. 
3-Record every moment of growth 
The AInanny supports 180-second(max) video recording and playback. If you insert an SD card, it also supports full-day recording, making it a 24-hour guardian of your baby. 
4-Night light 
The baby camera supports three lighting modes and multiple colors that can be set on the screen. 
5-Lullaby settings 
The camera comes with 3 lullabies and 1 white noise, also supports inserting an SD card to play more songs. 
Previous page
Next page
1 Smooth Night 2 Super Night Vision 3 Operation Log Record 4 Flexible Storage 5 What's in the Box 
More about the monitor 
1-Let's see more 
The Baby monitor has a 5-inch 720p resolution high-quality color LCD screen, and a 4x magnification function. Shows a sharp picture with 10 times more detail than ordinary 240p baby monitors. 
2-VOX mode & low power consumption technology 
The screen provides 7 hours for continuous use or 11 hours in a power-saving mode, and up to 6.5 days of standby time if the display is always off. 
3-1000ft range strong transmission 
The video baby monitor features a stable and wide transmission range of up to 1000ft in barrier-free areas, lower latency, and higher stability. 
4-SD card storage & cloud storage 
The baby camera supports FAT32 SD card storage (Max. 256G), so you can record funny videos or take screenshots via the monitor or the "ARENTI" App on your cell phone. (The SD card is sold separately) 
5-Upgraded dual security protection 
The Baby monitors adopt encryption technology to give you additional layers of security. You can also check the browsing records of the external network accesses to the camera from the monitor, and control the switch of the external network connection. This ensures that no one else can tap into the monitor and see what’s going on in your house without your permission. 
I have created an account on the Arenti APP, how do I connect to the camera? 
1-Click the '+' icon on the page & choose AInanny 
2-Click the bottom "Button" & enter the correct wifi infor 
3-Scan the QR Code on App at an appropriate distance 
4-After the beep sound, Click the Button & Wait for 20 seconds, the Set up is Finished 
What should I notice when connecting to the camera? 
1-Make sure the red light is Flashing before setting up 
2-The device only supports 2.4G, if the router is a Dual Band, please disable 5g, and then turn on 5g after the connection 
3-Make sure the device and mobile phone are connected to the same Wi-Fi 
How to pair the monitor with the camera? 
1. Press the Menu button on the monitor, and select the rightmost button-Camera. 
2. Select the camera need to pair. 
3. Long press the camera pairing button until you hear the prompt tone. 
4. Press the OK button on the monitor screen to start pairing. 
The color of indicator lights especially glaring in the dark room, how can i turn it off？ 
Yes, you can turn it off on the screen by following steps: 
1-Press Menu button 
2-Select the rightmost icon 
3-Select "Light" 
4-Select "Status Light" to turn it off 
The night vision indicator on camera is flicking on and off, and the clicking sound the camera makes wakes up my baby. 
This indicates that there may be lights in the room. 
It is recommended to change the direction of the camera so that it does not face the light source.

Quality Without Complexity 
The EOS Rebel T7 camera can help mobile device users take their photography to the next level. With a large 24.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor, fast autofocus, built-in wireless connectivity and more, it combines fantastic features with easy operation for high-quality images you'll be proud to share.

Beautiful Full HD Videos Made Easy 
Capture breathtaking Full HD quality video in a variety of recording sizes and frame rates, including 30p for a natural look. The camera's wide ISO range means confident shooting in nearly any light. 
Capture the Moment as You See It 
The EOS Rebel T7 camera's Optical Viewfinder lets you quickly line up and capture a photo in virtually any situation. It also helps you accurately see what the lens sees, even in bright sunlight. 
The Power of EOS Autofocus 
The EOS Rebel T7 camera features fast and accurate autofocus, which can enhance your shooting experience by making sure you're ready to capture the action as soon as it happens. 
Compose the Image You Want 
Scene Intelligent Auto mode delivers accurate exposure and enhancements to help bring out the beauty in virtually any scene, so you can concentrate on composing images without puzzling over settings. 
Explore Your Creativity with EF Lenses 
The EOS Rebel T7 camera's compatibility with all Canon EF and EF-S lenses provides plenty of creative opportunities for capturing everything from grand landscapes to faraway wildlife and more.

title: NUROUM C40(2nd Gen) 2K Video Conference Webcam with Microphone and Speaker, 5X Zoom, 4 Noise Cancelling Mics Conference Room Camera, 120°Ultra Wide Angle, 16ft Voice Pickup, for Zoom/Skype/Teams
inStockText: Only 12 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Audio & Video Accessories › Webcams & VoIP Equipment › Webcams
features: All in one Webcam for Conference Room: The Nuroum C40 video conference system combines a 120° ultra-wide-angle camera with a 5MP premium CMOS sensor, delivering 2K@30fps and 1080p@60fps images. Equipped with 4 AI noise canceling microphones and a premium high-fidelity loudspeaker, it ensures high-quality video and audio clarity for online meetings, presentations, and discussions, suitable for corporate teams.

Built-in Optimized Speaker & Noise Cancellation Mics: Featuring an optimized full-duplex speaker, the conference room webcam ensures clear communication for up to 15 offline participants within 16ft from the base. The 4-element omnidirectional microphone array, enhanced by compressed neural network technology, suppresses background noise, cancels echoes, and highlights voices, providing distortionless sound even in high-volume scenarios.

AI-Powered Auto Framing & 5X Zoom: The conference camera employs self-developed face recognition technology for precise framing of single and multiple participants. With automatic frame adjustment as more participants join, it keeps everyone in the optimal position. Additionally, the camera offers up to 5x zooming capacity, allowing users to focus on essential details with remote control.

Easy Setup & Enterprise-Grade Privacy Protection: The USB webcam is driver-free, offering a hassle-free plug-and-play experience with a single USB cable (a power adapter is provided for increased speaker volume). The remote control and top buttons provide convenient options to turn off the camera and mute the microphones. The round light ring displays the real-time status, ensuring user privacy is always under control.

Diverse Compatibility & Tailored Configuration: Compatible with desktop or laptop computers running Windows, macOS, Linux, or ChromeOS, the conference camera works seamlessly with popular VC platforms like Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, Webex, Hangouts, GoToMeeting and more. The Nuroum NearSync application facilitates firmware updates and allows customization of image settings such as brightness and saturation, available for both Windows and MacOS on Nuroum's official website.

4 Noise Reduction Mics 

The conference webcam is empowered by a cutting-edge 4-element omnidirectional microphone array and bolstered by advanced compressed neural network technology, our system excels in suppressing background noise, eliminating bothersome echoes, and accentuating voices. This ensures crystal-clear sound reproduction even in bustling environments, guaranteeing an unparalleled auditory experience, regardless of volume levels. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
5m/16ft Voice Pickup 

With its meticulously engineered full-duplex speaker, our computer camera delivers pristine communication, accommodating up to 15 offline participants within a 5m/16ft radius from the base. This ensures that every voice is heard with clarity and precision, fostering seamless interactions even in larger gatherings. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Plug & Play 

Our USB conference camera boasts a driver-free design, providing a hassle-free plug-and-play experience with just a single USB cable. Setting up the device is incredibly user-friendly, ensuring effortless installation for users of all skill levels. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
NearSync Software 

Visit our website to download and install Nuroum NearSync for either Windows or Mac on your computer.
Launch the NearSync application and navigate to the Device Update section.
Select the firmware version you want to upgrade online, or choose a local file provided by our support team for a local update. (The latest version is: V1.100.1.1.R.240523)
After the update, the device will restart and be recognized automatically. Please check if the current firmware version is the upgraded version
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
How do I activate and deactivate the auto framing function? 
You can enable or disable the AI framing function using either the touch button located on the top of the conference camera or the remote control. 
Is it necessary to download and install NUROUM NearSync on my PC before using the C40 video conference webcam? 
No, the webcam has a plug-and-play feature. No additional software or driver required. However, we recommend using NearSync upon receipt to update to the latest firmware version (V1.0.0.9.9.240130) for optimized image and audio performance. 
How can I disable noise cancellation? I'm a Yoga teacher and need background music for my courses. 
Currently, the option to disable noise cancellation is not available. However, our team is actively working on releasing a new firmware that will include this feature to better suit your needs. 
Is the power adapter required for using the all-in-one conference webcam? 
No, the power adapter is optional and is primarily used to enhance the speaker volume. Upon plugging in the power adapter, the speaker's power increases from 1.5W to 3W for an elevated audio experience. 
What should I do if the webcam is not recognized by my PC? 
If the round light is ON, please write to us for further assistance or to request a replacement. If the light is OFF, try using another USB cable. 
If the issue persists, ask for support and, if necessary, request a replacement.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Key Features 
40x Optical Zoom 
GET IN CLOSE - Let the powerful 40x optical zoom lens get you the shot you need. If you’re not feeling brave enough to get up close and personal, nobody needs to know. Just stand back and admire while zooming in and expect clear, crisp results with the KODAK PIXPRO AZ405. It’ll look like you were right there! 
20 Megapixels 
ALL THE DETAILS - You’ll get well defined, detailed images thanks to the AZ405’s 20 million pixels. That’s ample resolution to crop, zoom, or enlarge your photos however the photographer in you desires. 
3-inch LCD Screen 
A FULL VIEW - You know what you want out of a picture, and your camera should make sure that you’re able to get it. Whether you’re in the moment or modifying your work at a later time, the bright, 3” LCD screen ensures that you end up with just what you’re looking for. 
Optical Image Stabilization (OIS) 
NO BUMPS IN THE ROAD - Don’t fret if you’re on uneven ground or rough waters. The Optical Image Stabilization will iron out any small movements as you’re focused on getting your shot, so you never have to be afraid to go for what you want. Your camera can handle it…just make sure you can. 
24mm Wide Angle 
MAKE ALL THE ROOM - You don’t do anything halfway, so why should your camera? With a 24mm wide angle lens, there’s no sacrificing what you want in the frame. So go ahead and let your camera see what you see – the sky’s the limit! 
1080p Full HD VIdeo 
FULL HD DEFINED - Sometimes it can seem like things are moving a little too fast for you to get the perfect picture. That’s totally okay - the AZ405 has your back. You can rely on Full HD video with 1080p resolution for the quality you need. Why settle for anything less?

title: EMEET 1080P Webcam with Microphone, C960 Web Camera, 2 Mics Streaming Webcam, 90°FOV Computer Camera, Plug and Play USB Webcam for Online Calling/Conferencing, Zoom/Skype/Facetime/YouTube, Laptop/PC

features: Full HD 1080P Webcam with Cover for Video Calls - EMEET computer webcam provides design and Optimization for professional video streaming. Realistic 1920 x 1080p video, 5-layer anti-glare lens, providing smooth video. The fixed focal length makes the object in the focal length range of 11.8-118.1 inches, so as to provide a clearer image. The C960 usb webcam has a cover and can be removed automatically to meet your needs for protection. It is a great choice for home office.

Built-in 2 Noise Reduction Mics - EMEET webcam with microphone for desktop is 2 built-in omnidirectional noise reduction microphones, picking up your voice and filtering out background noise to create an excellent radio effect.EMEET computer webcam enables you to enjoy crystal clear voice for communication. (When installing the web camera, remember to select EMEET C960 usb webcam as the default device for the microphones)

Low Dependence on Light Conditio - Automatic low-light correction technology is applied in EMEET HD webcam 1080p so that the streaming webcam could capture the image in dim light. EMEET C960 camera for computer also has low-light boost, color boost and adjust exposure so you look your best, even in dim and harsh lighting. Imagine you are working in front of a sunny window. Is it convenient for no need to draw the curtains first when a video call comes in to get a normal exposure picture?

Plug-and-play & 90 Degrees Wide View - No driver required. EMEET C960 pc webcam can be used without drivers to realize plug and play for saving your trouble. The convenient foldable design of web camera allows you to take it anywhere, and the USB cord is long enough for any task. The 90° wide-angle lens of USB camera can accommodate more participants. In video calls, there is no need to frequently adjust the direction of the web cam to show people in different positions.

High Compatibility & Multi Application - C960 webcam for laptop is compatible with Windows 7/10/11, MacOS10.14 or later, Linux, Android TV 7.0 or later. The compatibility of the streaming camera is super wide for major software like Zoom, Facetime, Google Meet, Skype, YouTube and more. Whether this web camera is used for online studying/ teaching, home office, conference, meeting or video calling, the web camera is perfectly suitable for you as a tripod-ready universal clip. aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer

From the manufacturer
The EC70 Pan/Tilt security camera is the ideal camera for monitoring your home. You can check on your loved ones, and fur-babies whenever you are not there with pan/tilt capabilities to see the entire room. Whether a pet camera, baby monitor, or security camera, the EC70 will suit your needs. 
Previous page
Never Miss a Thing. Day or Night. 
View crystal clear live 1080p HD video with 360-degree horizontal and 133-degree vertical visibility. The Kasa Spot also comes with night vision that detects motion up to 30 ft. away in the dark. 
Capture All the Action with Motion Tracking 
Not only will you receive real-time alerts when your Kasa Spot Pan Tilt detects motion, but it will also track and follow the activity within the camera's field of view using advanced tracking 
Have Your Own Patrol Guard on Duty 
Patrol mode allows you to choose multiple distinct viewpoints and your camera will automatically cycle through each one at custom intervals so you can keep an eye on each region. 
Live View on Alexa and Google Devices 
Use a simple voice command to ask Alexa or Google Assistant to view your live camera feed on compatible Alexa or Google devices. 
Next page
Two Way Voice 
Communicate with your loved ones (even the four legged ones) when you are away from anywhere. Two way communications allows you to interact with those on camera. 
Check in Wherever, Whenever. 
Enjoy clear Full HD video on your phone wherever you are. Real-time live views of your favorites. 
Secure Your Videos Locally 
EC70 continuously records and stores footage on a local MicroSD card. The Kasa Spot is compatible with MicroSD cards up to 256 GB (MicroSD card not included). Premium cloud storage options are available.

description: Capture and keep your everyday moments forever with the Polaroid Now i-Type Instant Film Camera. From the manufacturer
360° Panorama Feature 
TAKE IT ALL IN - You have been planning the trip of a lifetime. What better way to share those once in a lifetime sunsets with friends and family than to use the full spectrum 360° Panorama mode. Just sweep the AZ528 across your subject and let this powerful camera do the rest. 
Key Features 
52x Optical Zoom 
GET IN CLOSE - There's no need to be in the thick of the action with this powerful mega-zoom lens. 52x optical zoom ensures you get right up close with all the clarity and detail of being right there. Center stage, orchestra or balcony level, every seat is the best seat in the house. 
16 Megapixels 
FILL IN THE DETAILS - Crisp, clean quality is what you’ll get with the details from 16 million pixels. Add a cutting-edge CMOS sensor and you've got the superb value with 6fps burst shooting, High Dynamic Range (HDR), and plenty of other features that make your storytelling reach new heights. 
WiFi Connectivity 
STAY CONNECTED - Don’t let anyone miss out on the action! The KODAK PIXPRO AZ528 Astro Zoom bridge camera can easily connect wirelessly to your smart device to you can upload and share your best shots with friends, family and the world while on the go. Now that makes life easier, doesn't it? 
1080p Full HD Video 
LIFE IN MOTION - Let's face it, life doesn't stand still and neither should you or your camera. The AZ528 makes it easier than ever to switch from clear beautiful photos to Full 1080p HD video with just the touch of a button. No toggling of dials, settings or missing that special moment in motion. 
24mm Wide Angle Lens 
ROOM FOR EVERYONE - Sure, we take photos every day when we're on the go and it's quantity versus quality. But for those special occasions, the moments you want to capture forever and include the entire family, this is the lens you want to use.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
About the Bluetooth Function 
Gsou audio Bluetooth Webcam, the bluetooth function is only for headsets, but not for video or picture. 
How to connect audio Bluetooth Device 
Switch to bluetooth
Press and hold the pairing button for ＞3s, then the indicator light flashes blue.
Turn on your bluetooth audio device to pairing state and close tp the camera.
Wait for a few seconds, the status indicator turns blue, connect successfully.
At this point, make sure your audio output is the device W20-AUDIO.
Connect devices that have already been connected back: just press once Pairing.
Attention: When you connect your headset and other audio device via bluetooth, you onlt need to select W20-AUDIO as the audio output.
Multiple Ways to Mount 
With 3 angles of adjustment, you can place Gsou Bluetooth webcam almost anywhere you want. With the built-in 360° rotation both right and left, you can easily move the camera to any angle you need.
Plug and Play & Tripod (Not included) 
The Gsou streaming webcam works with USB, no additional drivers or software required. The 5 ft USB cord is long enough for any task, just plug it in and you are ready to go!
The mounting clip can also be flexibly placed on tripod when you recording video or live streaming.
Protect Your Privacy 
Gsou PC webcam with privacy cover allows you to enjoy safety digital web life when not in use and prevent hackers from spying on you.To control what your video displays at any time, effectively protecting your privacy
Bluetooth 5.0 Technology 
The other webcams with built-in microphone in the market, may suffer noise and echo issue during video conference, our 1080p web camera with the innovative Bluetooth 5.0 chipset, works its magic to make you get a clear and natural sound even in noisy surroundings.
How to Open the Bluetooth Function 
One key to open or close the Bluetooth function. Left gear means built-in microphone function is on, and the Bluetooth function is off; Mid range means built-in microphone function is off, and the Bluetooth function is off; Right gear means Bluetooth function is on, and built-in microphone function is off.
No Distortion 
No distortion of the picture , video screen automatic analysis,the shooting picture is clear and undistorted
Noise reduce technology 
Ensure clear conversation in noisy environments 
270° Rotatable Microphone 
Charging time:2 Hours;Working time:About 17H(50% volume) 
Freely adjust the mic to the perfect angle to capture your voice; 
Tailor to how you wear, place on either your right or left ear 
Adjustable Headband 
Button Operation 
Answer a call: Press the control button once; Hang up: Press the control button once during a call; 
Reject a call: Hold the control button for 2 seconds; 
SIRI: Press and hold the control button for 2 seconds, then release

features: Maximize Security Coverage - 166° ultra-wide angle lens provides complete coverage without any blind spots. Live view all outdoor security cameras at once on a single screen, providing you with unparalleled visibility and control over your property. Rest assured that your home will be fully protected.

Advanced Encryption and Free Local Storage - Remotely access your locally secured smart camera footage from the included hub (built-in 32GB for up to 4-month of loop recording). Keep your home secure with aosu reliable home security camera solution - WirelessCam Pro System.

Smart Alerts, Quicker Action - Receive instant notifications for people coming, passing, staying. With quick preview image so you can judge and react quickly to potential threats, our wireless camera system provides greater convenience when keeping an eye on your home security.

See Every Detail - True 2K resolution! Captures crystal-clear details day and night. With an integrated spotlight so you can see more important features through these outside security cameras like faces or license plates in full color night vision.

Hassle-Free Wireless Security - Don't need to frequently recharge your home security system surveillance camera, enjoy flexible, wire-free installation with up to 240-day of battery life per charge*. aosu makes security cameras easy and convenience to any users. *Battery life is based on lab data with 40 events/day, 10s recording each. Camera-to-Camera Track & Sync - Automatically relate the videos of same period from multiple security cameras, make it easier and more convenient to check back and provide evidence.

One-Tap Convenience - When you are ready to leave your house or just come back home, control the working status of multiple outdoor security cameras with just one click on the aosu App, not just to turn on/off them.
2-Way Talk - Speak in real-time through the security camera to stay in touch at any moment. The integrated voice-changing feature easily disguises your voice for an added level of security.

Best Support - AOSU provides 24 hours quick respond. If you have any questions about this wireless security camera system, or if you are not 100% satisfied with this camera system, please contact AOSU firstly, we will provide the best support to you.

Integrated Smart Alarm

The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Does it support 2.4G/5Ghz dual band WiFi? 
It is compatible with 2.4G/5G WiFi router when setting up. Homebase is connected to the router with an ethernet cable, and security cameras actually receive signal from the homebase, which provides longer signal coverage and more stable transmission. 
Is it 24/7 continues recording? 
This AOSU battery-powered security camera system records events only when motion is detected, it doesn't record when nothing is happening. 
Does it has any fees for recording and any other features? 
Homebase offers 32GB for local storage. Around 120 days of loop recording for 2-Cam kit, 60 days for 4-Cam kit. No need to buy SD card. No hidden fees. If not enough, you can optionally purchase cloud storage(not mandatory). 
Is 166° Ultra-Wide-Angle a fixed viewing angle? 
YES, 166° fixed Ultra-Wide-Angle. Please know other bullet and dome security cameras are only fixed 100°-110°, even the clear viewing angle of human eyes is only 150°. 
Can I use the homebase for other AOSU cameras? Is it compatible with Apple HomeKit? 
The AOSU homebase currently supports up to 4 cameras of the same model. These cameras are compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant. Support for Apple HomeKit is still in development, so stay tuned for updates.

items.text: This AOSU battery-powered security camera system records events only when motion is detected, it doesn't record when nothing is happening.

items.name: Does it has any fees for recording and any other features?
items.text: Homebase offers 32GB for local storage. Around 120 days of loop recording for 2-Cam kit, 60 days for 4-Cam kit. No need to buy SD card. No hidden fees. If not enough, you can optionally purchase cloud storage(not mandatory).

items.name: Is 166° Ultra-Wide-Angle a fixed viewing angle?
items.text: YES, 166° fixed Ultra-Wide-Angle. Please know other bullet and dome security cameras are only fixed 100°-110°, even the clear viewing angle of human eyes is only 150°.

items.name: Can I use the homebase for other AOSU cameras? Is it compatible with Apple HomeKit?
items.text: The AOSU homebase currently supports up to 4 cameras of the same model. These cameras are compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant. Support for Apple HomeKit is still in development, so stay tuned for updates.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers appreciate the security camera's value for money, ease of setup, and picture quality. They find it easy to set up and use, with clear video and a nice display. The cameras function well and have night vision. Many are satisfied with motion detection and app functionality. However, some customers have differing views on battery life and audio quality.

From the manufacturer
15M Waterproof 
The Wetter the Better! 
Do you sometimes feel more comfortable in the water than on land? The same goes for this camera. It's easy to grip, simple to shoot and water tight. You never have to worry about getting the shot. Waterproof to 15 meters (49 feet). 
4x Optical Zoom 
Ready for your Close-up 
The WPZ2 is tough enough to get you out to where the action is, but sometimes you need a shot that's right in the thick of it all. With 4X Optical Zoom, you can get a close up without ending up in the impact zone. 
16MP BSI CMOS Sensor 
Detail Oriented 
16 megapixels lets you capture lifelike clarity in well defined and detailed images - without losing quality as you alter them later on. Crop, zoom, enlarge and unleash your inner photographer! 
2M Shockproof 
Handles the Hard Knocks 
Rigorous activities require tough accessories. If your equipment needs to be able to take a beating, you're in luck with the WPZ2. With a shockproof rating of up to 2 meters (6.56 feet), gadget bumps and bruises are a non-issue. 
Dustproof 
Keep it Clean 
The best vacation and adventure spots consist of more than just water. There's also a lot of salt, sand and grit that can get everywhere. Everywhere except for the inside the WPZ2, that is. 
Easy Wi-Fi Connectivity 
Stay Connected 
Don’t let anyone miss out on the action! The KODAK PIXPRO WPZ2 rugged camera can easily connect wirelessly to your smart device so you can upload and share your best shots with friends, family and the world while on the go. Now that makes life easier, doesn't it?

Real-Time Viewing & Night Vision 

This video introduces AOSU’s easy setup with no monthly fees, offering live viewing, quick snapshots, UHD/SD resolution options, and two-way audio for instant communication. It also highlights night vision with a color spotlight and the ability to monitor multiple cameras at once.

Local Storage & Strong Wireless Signal

It also shows how motion events are captured for easy review and emphasizes the strong, reliable wireless connection provided by the home base for seamless coverage throughout most homes. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Wireless Setup & Solar Power 

This video highlights AOSU’s wireless, easy-to-install cameras with flexible solar panels and long cables for optimal placement. It emphasizes lasting battery life, requiring just two hours of sunlight daily to stay charged, even in cloudy conditions. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
IP66 Weatherproof 

This video showcases AOSU security cameras’ durability by demonstrating their reliable operation during heavy rain, ensuring consistent performance even in extreme outdoor conditions. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Voice Control & Live Feed Access 

This video demonstrates AOSU’s ability to link with your phone app for easy access to live camera feeds. It also highlights voice control, allowing users to effortlessly stream views from different cameras, like the driveway or front yard, with simple commands. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Unboxing Overview 

This video covers a Youtuber’s unboxing and first impressions of the AOSU SolarCam Pro System, highlighting key components like solar panels, 2K cameras, and the home base. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Are there monthly fees or additional charges for using other features? 
Aosu "No Monthly Fee" ensures that there are no additional charges after your purchase. Cloud storage is an optional value-added service that incurs additional fees upon subscription, but it is not mandatory. 
Does it support 24/7 continuous recording? How long can the recordings be stored? 
Due to its battery-powered design, the camera doesn't support 24/7 continuous recording. It activates recording only when motion is detected. The Aosu homebase's 32GB local storage enables loop recording for 60 days with 4 cameras. 
Does it support 2.4Ghz/5Ghz dual band WiFi? 
During setup, the homebase works with both 2.4Ghz and 5Ghz WiFi routers. Connecting it to the router via Ethernet allows the cameras to transmit signals from the homebase, providing wider coverage and a stable connection. 
How efficient is the solar panel for charging? 
Cameras can operate all day after just 2 hours of direct sunlight charging. For best efficiency, position the solar panel in direct sunlight. The panel's charging cable is 3m/10ft long for flexible installation. 
Can I use the homebase for other Aosu cameras? Is it compatible with Apple HomeKit? 
The Aosu homebase currently supports up to 4 cameras of the same model, not other Aosu products. These cameras are compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant. Support for Apple HomeKit is still in development, so stay tuned for updates.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description

Product Description

description: Extreme all-weather gear: A rugged chassis that can be relied on in the harshest conditions. Approximately 20 effective Megapixel for sharp, high-resolution, low-noise images with a wide dynamic Range. Camera body of tough aluminum-panel chassis equipped with high-precision GPS, a powerful LED ring Light, and new movie SR+. features: Higher resolution Images: an effective 20 megapixels, low noise, and a wide dynamic Range combine for sharp, highly-resolved pictures.
Uncompromising outdoor design: extreme all-weather gear - a rugged chassis that can be relied on in the harshest conditions.
WATERPROOF 20M: With features that include uncompromising waterproofing—good for 2 continuous hours of use at a depth of 20 m
More advanced movie recording: shoot highly-realistic 4K movies while keeping shake to a minimum with the camera’s powerful shake reduction feature.

The camera can be used as a webcam by connecting it to the computer. You can share clear live streaming images of small subjects by using together the ring light and the macro shooting functions which enables images to be taken as close as up to 1cm from the subject

A variable-brightness ring light: The lens is surrounded by 6 variable-brightness, individually-controlled LEDs that can be Used in a host of various ways such as illuminate the entire subject, eliminating shadows, or directed to add depth by deepening shadows during macro photography.

DIGITAL MICROSCOPE MODE: The WG-6’s Digital Microscope mode makes it easy to take impressive macro photographs that capture details that cannot be resolved by the naked eye. The 6-LED Ring Light helps prevent blur by allowing faster shutter speeds.

Selection of 18 scene modes: just choose the appropriate option from the camera’s selection of 18 scene modes and let the camera adjust aperture, shutter speed, and other settings to suit the subject.

Camera at work: The wg-6 features a tough Chassis, enhanced crush proofing, and an easy-to-use design that lets you shoot without taking off your gloves. The ring light can be Used for construction-site photos that clearly show cracks in concrete and other fine details.
What's in the box: includes battery, USB power adapter, power plug, USB cable, hand strap and macro stand

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Key Features: 
27mm Wide Angle Lens 
Why limit yourself to standing back to get the whole gang in the shot? With a 27mm wide-angle lens, the FZ45 means you don't have to. It gives you plenty of space to work with for all your friends. 
16 Megapixels 
16 megapixels gives you ample detail to play with, so have fun! Not only will you never have to worry about the quality of your photos, but you can change them up afterwards while keeping that clarity. If you need to zoom in and crop, go right ahead. 
2.7 Inch LCD 
The best way to make sure your photo is going to come out great is to see it ahead of time. Thanks to a big, bright 2.7-inch LCD screen, you can do just that. Just point, frame, and shoot. 
4x Optical Zoom 
The FZ45 has both optical zoom and digital zoom to make sure that you are able to capture all of the details that are important to you. 
1080P Full HD Video: Making Memories Move 
FULLY DEFINED 
For those times when a photo isn't enough, the FZ45 can record 1080p Full HD video so you can capture all of the action - however large or small. 
AA Battery Convenience 
The FZ45 is our answer to portability and convenience. Take this camera anywhere you go and rely on the convenience of AA batteries to never miss a shot or capturing that special moment to cherish for years.

title: TP-Link 𝗧𝗮𝗽𝗼 MagCam, 2024 PCMag Editors’ Choice & Wirecutter Recommended Outdoor Security Camera, 2K, Battery, Magnetic Mount Wireless Camera, 150° FOV, SD/Cloud Storage, Person/Vehicle Detection
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video Surveillance › Surveillance Cameras › Bullet Cameras
description: The Tapo C425 is a wire-free, battery-powered camera with a versatile magnetic mount for hassle-free installation and access. Equipped with a large capacity 10000mAh battery, the C425 provides up to 300 days of uninterrupted performance on a single charge for less maintenance and more enjoyment. Designed for indoor and outdoor use, the camera is protected from dust and liquids with its robust IP66 weatherproof rating. With 2K QHD resolution, 150° super-wide FOV (Field of View), and full-color night vision via built-in spotlights, capture sharper videos and monitor vital areas with clarity. The Tapo C425 offers free AI detection (detects people, pets, and/or vehicles), secure local & cloud storage, customizable sound & light alarms, full-duplex two-way audio, and voice-activated automation with Amazon Alexa and Google Home. Experience top-notch security and convenience with the Tapo C425, effortlessly keeping an eye on what matters, all without the need for a hub.
features: 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞-𝐑𝐢𝐜𝐡, 𝐖𝐢𝐫𝐞-𝐟𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲: The C425 camera addresses common security camera challenges with its easy installation and maintenance. It offers a range of features designed to simplify monitoring and enhance security.

𝐖𝐢𝐫𝐞-𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 & 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: This IP66 weatherproof camera offers hassle-free, wire-free mounting. Its magnetic base enables easy attachment to metal surfaces, providing flexible indoor and outdoor placement.

𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐝 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞: The 10000mAh battery offers up to 300 days of use. For continuous power, use the optional Tapo A200 Solar Panel (sold separately), which eliminates the need for recharging. together.
𝟐𝐊 𝐐𝐇𝐃 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝟏𝟓𝟎° 𝐅𝐎𝐕: The 2K QHD resolution provides clear details like license plates, offering 1.7x the pixels of 1080p. The 150° field of view covers a larger area for broader monitoring.
𝐅𝐮𝐥𝐥-𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐫 𝐍𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧: Capture vibrant, full-color images at night with the integrated Starlight sensor and built-in spotlights.

𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐥 & 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐮𝐝 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞: Store footage on up to a 512GB microSD card (sold separately) or subscribe to the Tapo Care for cloud storage, which offers 30 days of video history. [Check the TP-Link site for microSD card compatibility before purchasing.]

title: SOVMIKU 2CQ1 AI 2K Solar Security Camera Wireless Outdoor, Battery Powered,Two Way Audio,Motion Detection, 360° View,Easy to Setup,Color Night Vision,Audible Flashlight Siren,180 Days Exchange Policy
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video Surveillance › Surveillance Cameras › Bullet Cameras
features: 𝗨𝗽 𝘁𝗼 𝟮𝟯%, 𝗠𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝗻 𝟱𝟬 𝗱𝗮𝘆𝘀, 𝗠𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝗻 𝟴 𝘆𝗲𝗮𝗿𝘀：Monocrystalline silicon solar panels with an energy conversion rate of up to 23%, Built-in high-capacity 9000mah batteries, A complete charge can make the camera work for 60 days or more, High quality battery and less charging times enable the camera to be used for more than 8 years.

【Always-On detection, Audible & Flashlight Alarm】With CQ1 camera, the Passive Infrared Sensor is always on,When a warm body like a human or animal passes by,It will first trigger the PIR sensor, and then the PIR will activate the camera in a period of more than 10 milliseconds. If it is at night, it will also activate spotlight. If the Alarm Flash feature and Alarm Siren is on, device will automatically flash and sound an alert when the motion sensor is triggered.

𝗥𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲 𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗼𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿 𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗲𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗵：Sovmiku has powerful global Internet services.After you connect Sovmiku CQ1 Wi-Fi camera to the internet, even if you travel on the other side of the earth,you can get real-time images of your home and hear family through the “Vicohome” App.Download free App “Vicohome” from Google Play or Apple App Store.

𝟮𝗞 𝗖𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗮, 𝗠𝗶𝗻𝗱-𝗯𝗹𝗼𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗱𝗲𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗹, 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵 𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗖𝗠𝗢𝗦：equipped with High tolerance CMOS and PIR Sensor, can provide 2K ultra-high-definition images and videos regardless of the weather condition. The advanced quad-pixel sensor on the Main camera makes the most of 3 megapixels by adapting to what you’re shooting, Shooting in 3MP delivers 4x the resolution for jaw-dropping cropping.

𝗦𝗲𝘁𝘂𝗽 𝗶𝗻 𝗺𝗶𝗻𝘂𝘁𝗲𝘀：Just 4 steps. 1) Install Vicohome App from Google play or Apple App Store. 2) Register a Vicohome account with your email or mobile number and Sign in. 3) Select the "add camera now" button on the app, then enter your WiFi name and password, and then a QR code will appear. 4) Press power button on the camera for 3 seconds, Scan the QR code on your phone with the camera
