title: Video Camera Camcorder Digital Camera Recorder Full HD 1080P 15FPS 24MP 3.0 Inch 270 Degree Rotation LCD 16X Digital Zoom Camcorder Camera with 2 Batteries(Black)
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video › Camcorders
features: Video Camera as Webcam: The video camera is useful to take the beautiful photos and share it in your Youtube. It can be used as webcam when the camera connect the computer. Please operate the camera button to choose the PC CAM mode. When the AMCAP window is opened, from which shooting object through the camera will be showed on this window. You can have a video call with your families or friends. Please download the software AMCAP before use the webcam function

Multifunction Camcorder: 1080P 15fps Video Resolution, 24MP Image Resolution, image format JPEG, video format AVI, 16X digital zoom, camcorder with fill light, 3.0 inch LCD and supports 270 degree rotation, Anti-shake, Face Capture, Beauty Function, Self-timer and Webcam function, Pause function, USB 2.0, TV Output, Setting Date and Time

Pause Function: This video camera supports Pause function, so you can pause the recording when you need,then continue recording again without starting a new one, which makes it easier for you to edit and upload the videos. This video camera included a USB cable, you can connect it directly to the computer to upload videos. This video camera included a AV cable, you can connect it directly to the TV to playback the videos

Recording While Charging: The camcorder come with two NP FV5 batteries. It allows you to keep recording around 60 to 90 minutes when it's fully charged. For the first time use need to charge more than 8 hours. The camcorder support the recording while charging,good to record long videos anytime

Small and Compact Camcorder: The camcorder supports SD card and SDHC card up to 128GB not included, just remember to format the SD card before use the camcorder first time. The camcorder support the tripod not included connection and the hole is standard size

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Specification: AntiShake: On/Off. Smile capture: On/Off. Video Sound: Support. TV Output: NTSC/PAL. 
Pause function:Support. Built-in microphone:Support. USB port: USB 2.0(MSDC&PC CAM). 
Date stamp: Off/Date/Date&Time Driver mode: Off, Self-timer 2 seconds,Self-timer 10 seconds,Burst. 
LED Fill Light: Fill light can't be used under Playback mode. Display Screen:3.0 inch, 270 degree rotation. 
File format: image format (JPEG),video format(AVI). Image sensor:CMOS image sensor,max 24.0 mega pixels. 
Digital zoom:16X（Not support the auto focus, optical zoom）. Effect: Normal/B&W/Sepia/Red/Green/Blue. 
Format:Yes/No(format the SD card first). Image Resolution:24M(6000x4500),20M(5120x3840),16M(4608x3472),12M(4000x3000). 
Operating system requirements：Windows 7/8/10/2002/XP/Vista/macOS. White balance: Auto/Daylight/Cloudy/Fluorescent/Tungsten. 
Focusing Range: Normal 1.2m to infinity; Micro 15cm to 25cm. Modes:Take Photos/Record Videos/Record Audio/Playback Modes. 
Memory Card:Support SD memory card and MMC card,4GB up to 128GB.(the SD card is not included in the package,need to purchase separately). 
Camera lens: Fixed lens,Aperture F/3.2,Focal distance f=7.36mm. Video Resolution: FHD 1920x1080(15fps), HD 1280x720(30fps),640x480(30fps). 
Package Included: 
(1)1XCamcorder (2)1XUser manual (3)1XUSB charger (4)1XAV&USB cable (5)1XReusable camcorder bag (6) 2XRechargeable Lithium batteries 
Warm Tips: 
(1)The camcorder is design for the amateurs,not for the Professional users. (2)The camcorder only can support LED Video Light, as Light Supplement(Not Include), not support the external microphone. (3)Please format the SD card before use the camcorder(in order to avoid system malfunction),the SD card is not included in the package. 
The camera can support TV and Computer output 
Connect to the TV: 
1. Please connect the camera to your TV with the AV cable. 
2. Please set the TV signal source as AV and get into this mode. 
3. You will find the camera screen that turning black which is normal, not the camera malfunction. And the content will be displayed on your TV screen. You need to operate the camera to display your photos/videos. (Notice: In this mode, the icons on the screen cannot be removed.) 
Connect to the Computer: 
1.Please turn on the camera,insert the USB Cable into the camera and computer port separately. 
2.The computer will automatic install driver and the computer screen will display the driver installation is complete. 
3.Please press the camera "MODE" button to choose the camera “MSDC ”mode,then open the U disk,the camera files can be seen. 
Please format the sd card 
The camcorder can support SD/MMC Memory Card. (4GB to 128GB, Memory Card needs to buy separately). 
Warm Tips: 
1. Memory card needs to be formatted for first-time use or if the card was used by other camcorder.) 
2. If the camera crashes or shows a blurred screen, please format the SD card within the camera or on the computer before using it. 
3. If the SD card can't be locked in the slot, which means it has not reached the correct position and you need to press deeper to make sure it is locked. 
If you want to use the camera as a webcam to have video calls or Live stream: 
1. Please connect the camera to your PC. 
2. You will see 2 choices on the screen: "MSDC" & "PC camera", choose the "PC camera" and press OK". If it has been confirmed, there would be a camera icon on the screen. 
3. Open the software you want to use (We recommended to use "AMCAP", it is easy to download and use). 
The camera can support record while charging, you can connect the camera to the power source and don't need to worry the batteries run out. 
The camera can support the Pause function, you can pause and continue the recording at your wish without starting a new file. 
The camera use of detailed instructions: 
1. Insert the fully charged battery and memory card into the camera, then press the" POWER" button to turn on the camera. 
2. How to format the memory card: Please press the "Mode" button to get into the "Setup" page. Choose the "Format" option and press "OK" to confirm. 
3. How to switch modes: Press the "Mode" button to switch modes between "Photo/Video/Setup". 
4. How to take photos: Press the "Mode" button to change to the "Photo" mode. Press the "Photo" button to take a photo. 
5. How to record videos: Press the "Mode" button to change to the "Video" mode. Press the "START/STOP" button to start the recording. You can press the "Photo" button to pause the recording. And press the "START/STOP" button to finish the recording. 
6. How to playback photos/videos: Press the "Playback" button(Beside the Menu button), and then press the "Left/Right" button to browse. Press the "START/STOP" to playback video and press the "Photo" button to pause. 
7. How to delete photos/videos: Press the "Playback" button(Beside the Menu button), and then choose the one you want to delete, press the "Menu" button then choose "Delete" and confirm to delete. 
8. How to adjust the volume: The volume can be only adjusted while playback. Use the zoom toggle to adjust the volume. 
9. How to turn on the fill light: Press the "OK" button to turn on the light and press it again to turn off.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Flexible WiFi Connetion Options for Faster Speed / Longer Distance 
Previous page
Next page
This solar security camera outdoor captures 5MP SHD videos, with a visual distance of up to 33 feet and a 110° wide field of view, day & night. The high-capacity rechargeable battery and WiFi connection make it completely wireless and ideal for outdoor use. 
Previous page
Smarter Detection, More Accurate Alerts 
Sends instant push notifications to you when the motion of a person, vehicle or animal is detected. 
Focus on What Really Matters 
Customize the motion zone, deciding where to detect the motion and where not. 
Customizable PIR Schedule 
Set up PIR sensitivity and schedule for fewer false alarms and longer battery usage. 
Warn off the Intruder 
Once the camera detects suspicious motion, the custom siren will be activated in no time. 
Smart & Quick Playback 
Finding important moments is made much easier by the smart event filters and timeline. 
Next page
1 Smart Detection 2 Motion Zone 3 PIR Schedule 4 Customizable Siren 5 Smart Playback 
No Hidden Costs for Storage 
Local Storage, No Extra Fees 
Local storage is available, and up to 128GB microSD card is supported (but not included). FAT32 format with Class 10 read/write speed is required. You can use on-camera smart features without subscription. 
Smart & Quick Playback 
Finding important moments is made much easier by the smart event filters and timeline, and access and playback anytime and anywhere via Reolink APP/Client. 
Remote Live View 
Easy access from anywhere and live view anytime to know what's happening at your home or store via the free Reolink App/Client. 
Works with Smart Home Devices 
Ask your smart device to show you the camera's live feed simply via voice command. Actions speak louder than words? Words are enough. 
Capture the Dynamic Process 
It can speed up long processes like the whole construction process, sunrise, and sunset into minutes. Have fun viewing the changing world. 
Embraces Sunshine and Rain 
With a solar power supply and a waterproof body, the battery camera is ideal for outdoor use, rain or shine, hot or cold. 
What is the camera's battery life? 
When used with the compatible solar panel, 20 minutes of direct sunlight per day maintains continuous power, with a full 11-hour charge lasting up to 4 months. 
Does this camera support continuous video recording? 
Regrettably, this battery camera does not offer continuous recording capabilities due to the consideration of the battery life. You may consider Reolink's other non-battery powered cameras. 
Is NAS or RTSP streaming supported? 
This camera only facilitates remote access and live viewing through the Reolink App/Client. Support for RTSP and NAS integration is available by utilizing the Reolink Home Hub, with no subscription fees. 
Can I selectively delete video clips stored on the Micro SD card? 
Reolink cameras do not support deleting specific video clips stored on the micro SD card via software. You must remove the card and delete footage on a computer.This functionality is slated for a future software release, please stay tuned for updates 
Supports USB Type-A to USB Type-C cables only. 
When not utilizing the solar panel, this camera only supports charging via a USB Type-A to USB Type-C cable.

description: The Instax Mini from Fujifilm has been updated for selfie shooters better than ever before. Get photos instantly with the sleek, fun, and stylish Fujifilm Instax Mini 12 camera. Key Features 
Slim Design 
Portable, pocket-sized and ready to go wherever your life takes you, the FZ55 is our answer to a compact, affordable and intuitive digital camera that will deliver fantastic photos and video with the push of a button. 
5x Optical Zoom 
The FZ55 offers a generous 5x zoom in a slim fitting design. Take this user friendly point and shoot wherever you go and zoom in as close as you need. 
28mm Wide Angle

One Touch 1080P Full HD Video 
The FZ55 takes a simple approach to effortlessly switching between photos to 1080P Full HD Video with the touch of a button. Talk about simplicity at its best.

title: TP-Link Tapo 2K Pan/Tilt Security Camera for Baby Monitor, Dog Camera w/Motion Detection, 2-Way Audio, Siren, Night Vision, Cloud & SD Card Storage, Works with Alexa & Google Home, 2-Pack (C210P2)
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video Surveillance › Surveillance Cameras › Dome Cameras
description: With crystal clear 2K HD video, the Tapo C210 Home Security Wi-Fi gives you the ability to always keep an eye on your family, pets, and protect your home. With person and motion detection, get instant notifications that matter when there is activity going on. Also used as a baby camera monitor, Tapo C210 provides free baby crying detection. Check what's inside your home, even at night with night vision thanks to the integrated IR sensor. With device sharing, you and a family member can both monitor the feed making keeping an eye on the little ones just a little bit easier. Save footage continuously onto a 512 GB micro-SD card (not included) or subscribe to Tapo Care for 30-day video history and many other benefits. [Before purchasing a microSD card, please check the TP-Link website FAQ to ensure compatibility with your device.] With crisp 2-way audio, you'll never truly be away again with the ability to hold clear conversations with who's there. Additionally, keep your family safe from unwanted intruders by playing the built-in siren and light alarm.
features: 【2K High Definition】Capture every detail inside your home with crystal-clear 2K high definition video with this indoor security camera. Easily see what your baby is holding or what your pet is playing with.Controller Type:Amazon Alexa;Android;Google Assistant.Connectivity protocol:Wi-Fi.Power source type:Corded Electric, Power Adapter: 100–240 V
【Up, Down, All Around】This Pan/Tilt IP camera see everything across an entire room or walkway with the 360° horizontal and 114° vertical range pan/tilt field of view.

【Detection & Instant Notification】Get instant push notifications when motion, person or baby crying is detected, there is no additional fee to use it as a baby camera monitor. Discern from notifications that matter, so you'll know if its your pet playing around or if someone is actually there.

【Works w/ Alexa & Google Assistant】Fully compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, use your simple voice command to view Tapo indoor security camera live stream on Echo Show or Google Chrome Cast with a screen. Easily get your home security footage up on a larger TV display.

【2-Way Audio w/ Built In Siren】Never truly leave home with the built-in 2-way audio. Use as a pet camera with phone app to comfort your pet from anywhere in the world. Keep your family safe with cameras for home security indoor by warding off intruders.
【Night Vision up to 30 Ft.】Never miss a thing that goes on, even at night thanks to the integrated IR system on this indoor camera which provides 30 feet of night vision.

【Device Sharing】View your WiFi camera feed from two different smart phone devices. Now mom and dad can both see what's happening at home with a single camera, making keeping an eye on the little ones just a bit easier.

description: Essential Outdoor Camera provides smart home security with crystal-clear 2K resolution. Zoom in 12x to see license plates and eye color in detail, perfect for home security. Get alerts and watch live video from your security camera on your phone. This wireless security camera lets you ward off intruders with the Integrated Spotlight, or with the Integrated Siren by triggering it automatically or manually from the Arlo Secure App. Identify details in low light with Color Night Vision and hear and speak clearly with visitors with noise-canceling audio. Set it up in minutes by connecting directly to Wi-Fi. Install these outdoor security cameras with full confidence thanks to their rechargeable battery and weather-resistant design. An Arlo Secure plan trial is included. After trial, a paid plan is required to keep premium features like 30-day video cloud storage, People, Package, Vehicle Detection, 24/7 Emergency Response, and more. This camera is not yet compatible with Apple Home and Arlo SmartHub/BaseStations. This camera is for use in US only. However, you will be able to access and control your camera remotely from anywhere with the Arlo Secure App.
features: Exceptional Indoor & Outdoor Wireless Camera (2 Cameras) - Watch, listen & talk. Monitor your home, property & keep loved ones safe, 2K video quality. Complete home monitoring system, add additional cameras throughout your exterior & interior. ​

Arlo protects your everything. Including your privacy - At Arlo, we are as passionate about privacy as we are about safeguarding your home & family. Arlo is designed to keep your personal information private and in your control.

Don’t miss a moment with the Arlo Secure App - Get real-time notifications with motion activation & live video 2-Way Audio, streaming in the Arlo app. Remote siren activation, Color Night Vision & large Field of View (130 degrees) & Integrated Spotlight.

Get more with an Arlo Secure Plan (subscription required) - Share & store video for up to 30 days, see animated previews from your phone's lock screen, personalize your security with people and vehicle recognition + package and animal detection.

Customer service designed for you Get help for your products within the Arlo app and join the Arlo community to learn, ask questions or share feedback. 24/7 chat is also available on the Arlo website and in the app.​

Connect with your favorite smart home partners - Works with Amazon Alexa & Google Assistant. Get more from Arlo with IFTTT automations such as receiving low battery notifications & turning on compatible lights when motion is detected. ​

Is a subscription required for my Essential Outdoor Camera (2nd Gen) to work after the 30-day trial ends? 
No. A subscription is not required for your camera to work. Without a subscription, you will continue to receive notifications when motion is detected and be able to view live video feed. A subscription is required to maintain premium features. 
Can I remove the battery in my Essential Outdoor Camera (2nd Gen)? 
No. The battery in your Essential Outdoor Camera (2nd Gen) is fully integrated and cannot be removed. You can recharge the camera with the indoor charging cable that is included with the camera. 
Are the Essential Outdoor Cameras (2nd Gen) completely wire-free? 
Yes. The Essential Outdoor Cameras (2nd Gen) are fully wire-free and powered with an integrated battery. However, purchase extra accessories like Essential Solar Panel (2nd Gen) and Essential Outdoor Charging Cable (2nd Gen) to charge your camera. 
Is this camera compatible with Apple Home or Arlo SmartHub and Base Stations? 
Yes. To connect your Essential to Arlo SmartHub/Base Stations, ensure your camera has the latest firmware, then remove it, re-onboard it, and connect it. 
No. Apple Home is not yet compatible with Essential Cameras (2nd Gen). 
In which countries can I use this camera? 
This camera is for use in US only. However, you will be able to access and control your camera remotely from anywhere with the Arlo Secure App.

We also provide a soft carry bag for you to protect the camera from accidental screen damage, especially when encountering hard sharp objects.

ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIALS & EASY TO USE - Made of eco-friendly reliable materials, the kid camera is safe and non-toxic, durable and safe for kids to use. The clear simple settings and features of the mini digital camera are easier for kids to figure out and use by themself. Just install the SD card and battery, two seconds to turn it on, and freely capture all fun memories with friends, family.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL DIGITAL CAMERA - 16X digital zoom is great for photographing objects in the distance. 20 filter effects help to take creative photos with different styles. Anti shake helps to take stabler and clearer photos. Date stamp help to record the date and time of the moment you capture. Webcam, face and smile detection, continuous shooting, self-timer, waiting for you to explore.

COMES WITH ALL YOU NEED & WARRANTY- We provide a one-year satisfaction warranty, along with a no-hassle replacement policy, any problem or question with the camera, please contact us for help. Package list: Digital Camera, 32 GB Micro SD Card, Type C Cable, Charger Adapter, Rechargeable Battery, Lanyard, and Carry Bag. It's a meaningful Christmas or birthday gift camera for kids, experience the lovely life, and leave funny memorable moments with family or friends.

title: Video Camera Camcorder,4K 56MP 60FPS,IR Night Version Flip Screen 16X Zoom WiFi,Vlog YouTube Recorder Camera with Mic Flash Lens Hood Stabilizer 2 Batteries 32BG 2.4G Remote Control Charger
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video › Camcorders
features: 4K UHD & 48MP Camcorder: This 4K camcorder can shoot high-definition video, 48MP photo shooting, clearer than the ordinary 1080P on the market. Equipped with a 3.0-inch LCD touch screen, support 270-degree rotation, 16x digital zoom, remote control, USB 2.0, TV outputt. Our package is equipped with two batteries, you don’t have to worry about the power consumption during shooting, is very suitable for travelers.

Built Fill Light: With LED lights, single press the "shutter" button to enter the fill light mode, shoot in a low light environment. This camcorder can be connected to a computer via an HD high-definition cable (included), as a network camera, for real-time streaming on social media such as Youtube, Facebook, or video calls with family and friends. Transfer and save the camera's files on your computer. You can also connect to an HDTV to browse high-definition album videos.

Pause & WiFi Function: You can pause at any time while recording, when you press "Record" again, you can continue shooting without starting a new file. It is very suitable for video lovers, will bring great convenience to future video editing. Our camcorder has built-in WiFi (support IOS, Android devices), can download the corresponding APP on your mobile phone or tablet, connect to the camera's WiFi, can view high-definition video photos on other devices.

Remote Control & External Microphone: With the help of the remote control (included), can control the camera at any time without missing any group photos. It is also very convenient to take pictures by yourself when you are traveling. The camcorder has a hot shoe interface, can install a microphone when needed, it can improve the sound quality, reduce the surrounding noise, is the ideal microphone camcorder for YouTube blogs, video lovers.

Sincere Service: We provide 24-hour online service. If you have any questions about our products during the shopping process, you can contact us at any time. We are happy to provide you with answers. We have a professional team that can offer good service for you

description: Capture real life on the Go. Our most portable, wearable, take anywhere-able Polaroid Go Generation 2 instant camera has been upgraded with a large aperture range, precise light sensor, and on-point-exposure settings to make your pictures even better. It’s really small (the smallest instant camera in the world) but comes with big creative potential featuring a selfie mirror, self-timer, double exposure, and can be paired with its own teeny tiny color filters. All in the classic design, and now made with 30% recycled materials. Includes a Polaroid Color Go Film Double Pack for 16 color instant photographs with white frames. Compatible with Polaroid Go film, our smallest Polaroid instant film format.
features: POLAROID GO MINI CAMERA + MINI FILM BUNDLE: The Polaroid GO Everything Box has everything you need to get stared. Bundle includes Polaroid GO camera and a double pack of GO color film, 16 photos.
NEW FILM FORMAT: The Polaroid Go camera only takes Polaroid Go format film. It's the same Polaroid magic you know and love, only smaller.
NEW & IMPROVED: Our new Go Generation 2 analog instant camera is now made with 30% recycled materials and the internal lithium-ion battery charges via USB-C
CREATE BIG, SMALLER: Portable, wearable, and take-anywhere-able. The Polaroid Go camera is your new mini partner in creativity.

title: HDMI USB PTZ Camera 20x Optical Zoom USB Support 4K30fps, HDMI Support 1080P Conference Camera for Remote videoconferencing, Broadcasting, Church Events, Schools, etc. Live Streaming Camera
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Accessories & Peripherals › Audio & Video Accessories › Webcams & VoIP Equipment › Webcams
features: HDMI PTZ Camera with 20x optical zoom and 54.8° FOV distortion-free angle, featuring 1/2.8-inch 8.5MP high-quality image sensor for high-resolution quality images. It makes it easy to deal with video conferencing, distance learning, remote training, telemedicine, live church broadcasts, etc.

PTZ conference room camera supports USB video output frame rate up to 4KP30, HDMI video output frame rate 1080P30, backward compatible with 1080P,720P resolution. Provides clearer images and sharper video. Perfect for Zoom, Skype, YouTube, Facebook Messenger, Teams, Facetime, Google Hangout, OBS, Google Meet and any other popular video calling software.

PTZ HDMI Conference Camera, support USB interface plug and play, no additional driver, USB connect to your laptop, desktop, or smart TV to start video conferencing, and then open the video conferencing software, you can get high-definition video images. The video format supports YUV, MJPG, H.264, which makes the motion video more vivid under low bandwidth conditions.HDMI interface output supports the mainstream equipment docking and matching, and can be directly connected to conference terminals, TVs, big screens, projectors and so on. Ideal for streaming live church broadcasts and worship services.

The PTZ camera is equipped with an IR remote control, which allows you to control the live camera to rotate 340° horizontally and 120° vertically via the IR remote control. Even if you are far away from the PTZ webcam, you can easily use the remote control to zoom, flip the image and rotate the PTZ camera at any angle in real time within 10 meters. With the built-in OSD menu, you can easily adjust the picture according to your on-site environment until you achieve the desired effect. If you are looking for a cost-effective PTZ camera, this is a good choice.

The streaming camera supports setting 9 presets via the IR remote control, set the preset position in the remote control, you can call to the position you want with one key, this function is very practical, and the video setup camera also supports VISCA, PELCO-D protocols, which can be controlled via the control keypad, set up to 255 presets using the RS232 and RS485 interfaces for professional control. Convenient way to quickly control the HDMI PTZ camera to pan, tilt, zoom and move to preset positions for close-up shots.

Live Streaming Camera supports Windows 7/8.1/10, Mac OS 10.10, Linux, Android or higher. Streaming Camera is also widely used in video calling, video conferencing, online courses, live church broadcasting, telemedicine, remote training, remote interviews, distance education and so on.Note: There is no built-in microphone.

The 20X HDMI PTZ camera supports a variety of mounting options. It can be mounted on a desktop, monitor, wall, tripod, or inverted ceiling. The package includes a DC 12V power adapter, an IR remote control, a ceiling mount bracket, a manual, a 5 meter USB 2.0 cable, and an RS232 control cable. The customer service team will answer your questions within 24 hours.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
WiFi Function Used as Bluetooth 
How to use WiFi? 
First: Install the app 
Download the APP named XDV PRO on the Apple App Store,or by scanning the QR code on the camera. 
Second: Connect to WiFi 
On your phone or tablet,go to WiFi settings and find "4K WIFI". 
Enter the displayed password: 12345678 to connect. 
Third: Start remote shooting or recording 
After connecting, open the camera app on your device and choose the remote shooting or record option. This will now display the camera's live view on your phone screen, and you also can summon and manipulate the settings. 
Benefits of WIFI function 
1. You can transfer photos and videos in the camera to your mobile phone or tablet (convenient) 
2. The camera can be controlled with a mobile phone or tablet (remote control) 
Tips: 
If you cannot connect to WiFi or use it after downloading, please turn off the mobile network of your phone. 
Seven Shortcut Key Functions 
W/T: Digital zoom, fast control
Supplemental light: you can take pictures at night or in a dark environment
Timed photo: Quickly enter timed photo
Continuous shooting: quickly enter the three continuous shooting
Delete: delete unwanted photos or videos
Display: press once to clear the icon on the screen, press twice to make the screen black
Menu: Quickly enter the menu key
4K Digital Camera 
4K Video Resolution and 48 Megapixels Pictures
This camera has 2 functions of recording and taking pictures 
Lightweight and compact
This camera measures 5(inch)*2(inch)*2.4(inch) and weighs 8.1 ounces. Easy to carry when traveling. 
Multifunction camera
The vlogging camera supports 16x digital zoom, video pause, recording while charging, loop recording, continuous shooting, silent recording, selfie.Best for YouTube shoot lovers 
Focus
Autofocus and manual focus

description: Make a statement with your style with the INSTAX MINI 40 instant camera. The INSTAX MINI 40 is pumped with attitude for today’s new generation of image makers and shot takers. Combining “fast to action” features with classic design cues and the use of INSTAX MINI instant film, it’ll keep you one shot ahead of the rest. The INSTAX MINI 40 is ready to hit the streets running thanks to its built-in selfie mode. Pull out the lens for an extra click, line yourself up in the mirror and capture your style in a one-of-a-kind selfie. With the power of automatic exposure, the camera automatically calculates the brightness of the environment you’re in, so what you see is what you get, every shot, every time. All this packaged up in a timeless and epic silhouette. We’ve even edged the design with premium silver accents, and added a deluxe black texture that is sensational to touch. We’ve gone all out to propel the INSTAX MINI 40 into a league of its own.
features: Classic, deluxe design with premium silver accents
Built-in automatic exposure for ideal pictures every time
Built-in one-touch selfie mode and selfie mirror
Uses INSTAX MINI instant film only; produces instant print, credit card sized 2” x 3” photos
Package includes: INSTAX MINI 40 instant camera, hand strap, user manual, 2 AA batteries

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Give your take. 
The INSTAX MINI 40 is pumped with attitude for today’s new generation of image makers and shot takers. Combining ‘fast to action’ features with classic design cues and fresh INSTAX MINI film, it’ll keep you one shot ahead of the rest. 
All about the INSTAX MINI 40 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Discover the NEW INSTAX MINI 40 
SELFIE MODE 
One-touch selfie 
Forget lens switching. The INSTAX MINI 40 is ready to hit the streets running, thanks to the built-in selfie lens. Fire up the lens with an extra click, line yourself up in the mirror and capture your style in a one of a kind selfie. 
AUTOMATIC EXPOSURE 
You want it, you’ve got it 
Slowing down is not an option. The INSTAX MINI 40 lets you give your take on the go. Auto shutter speed. Auto brightness. So, what you see is what you get, every shot, every time. 
DESIGNED FOCUSED 
Classic reinterpreted 
Timeless and epic. And that’s just the silhouette. Edged with premium silver accents, the deluxe black texture is sensational to touch, propelling the INSTAX MINI 40 into a league of its own. Time you made your statement? 
SIMPLE OPERATION 
Take it easy 
Join forces with the INSTAX MINI 40 and you’ll be firing up stunning, high quality images this season, and beyond. With fast functional controls, this camera lets you make your mark without missing a beat, or an iconic image. 
INSTAX MINI FILM 
Credit card-sized joy 
Your outlook, your style, your eye for a great shot. All captured on our high-quality film, from the experts at Fujifilm. They've gone the extra mile, so you'll always get prints that'll last a lifetime, whether you're keeping them or giving them away.

Product Description
Seven Shortcut Key Functions 
W/T: Digital zoom, fast control
Supplemental light: you can take pictures at night or in a dark environment
Timed photo: Quickly enter timed photo
Continuous shooting: quickly enter the three continuous shooting
Delete: delete unwanted photos or videos
Display: press once to clear the icon on the screen, press twice to make the screen black
Menu: Quickly enter the menu key
Compact Camera 
The camera is compact in size and the weight is decent. It's great for going out, traveling, or for kids. 
Mode Button 
Rotate the mode dial button to select the corresponding mode. The corresponding reference of the mode is as shown in the figure: 
Fill Light 
It can be used to fll light in a dark environment. Press the "up" button to quickly set to turn off fll light or turn on fl light. 
In the photo mode, press the "up " button to quickly set the following three corresponding flash modes.No flash, Auto flash, Forced flash 
In the recording mode, press the "up”button to quickly set two flash modes:no flash and forced flash. 
4K Digital Camera 
Main Feature： 
Video Resolution: 4K_3840X2160 (30FPS) 
Photo Resolution: 48MP, 30MP, 24MP, 12MP, 8MP, 5MP, 3MP 
Video/Photo Format:MP4/JPG 
Display: 3.0-inch ultra-high-definition 180-degree screen 
Storage: Micro SD card (class10 and above) 
Digital zoom: 16x digital zoom 
Lens: Fixed lens F/2.4MM，f=5.04mm 
Battery: Two NP-40 / 1500mAh lithium-ion batteries can work 2-3H, 2-3H Charging time 
Warm Tips: 
Please read the instructions carefully 
Before using the camera, format the SD card with the video camera(Micro SD card included) 
Due to the long time transport, the digital camera's battery will in the low power, please charge before using.

breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video Surveillance › Surveillance Cameras › Dome Cameras
features: 🌐 Total 360° Coverage & Quick Patrol: Our advance pan-tilt-zoom (PTZ) technology gives you a full all-around view of your property with smooth scanning movements. One tap quick patrol gives you a real-time complete view of the entire area.

📲 Smart Alerts & Motion Tracking: Enable smart tracking to follow the actions of your family, friends, or pets. When motion is detected, recieve alert instantly while the camera starts following the motion. The 3K (5MP) resolution lets you see every detail clearly.

🌙 Full-Color Night Vision & Integrated Smart Alarm: Nothing can hide in the dark with full-color night vision in 3K. This system features a smart spotlight and powerful alarms to deter unwelcome visitors and provide an extra layer of security.

🎤 Two-Way Talk & AI Noise Reduction: Talk to visitors in real-time with the wireless security camera's two-way talk functionality. AI noise-reduction technology ensures clearer communication and audio by filtering out ambient sounds.

🛠️ Easy Setup, Install, and Share-No Subscription Necessary: Supports 2.4GHz Wi-Fi via Bluetooth which makes set up quick and simple. Easily share access with loved ones. No monthly fee with local storage (microSD card not included).

Local or Cloud Encryption Storage 
Supports 8-128GB microSD card (not included), or cloud storage with subscription (free 7-day trial). 
aosuSmart Playback 
Event filters and intelligent fast forward and rewind features make finding important moments even easier. 
Personalize Alarm Schedule 
Easily set the alarm schedule to avoid unnecessary alerts and match your daily routine. 
Family Sharing 
Invite your family to stay connected and monitor your home's security in real-time. 
Smart Home Ready 
Connects to Alexa and Google Assistant so you can check in anytime to see what's going on around your home. 
Ready for Any Weather 
Rain, wind, or shine, aosu cameras are made for the outdoors. 
Does it support 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi and 5Ghz Wi-Fi? 
Only 2.4 GHz WiFi. Bluetooth will scan 2.4G WiFi quickly so you can set up the camera easily. 2.4G is better than 5G because stronger wall penetration ability, long distance and more stable. If you have 5G, the router also gives out 2.4G signal. 
Can this camera record continuously 24/7? 
This solar security camera only records event after motion is detected. 
Do I need cloud subscription to run the camera? 
You don't need to use cloud service if you chose to use a micro SD card for free local storage. 
Will it track when motion is detected? 
If any Human movement is detected, the solar camera will track and record it. 
Can it detect car? 
Yes, accurate detection of vehicle and people.

features: 360° Full-Coverage & 3K Resolution: AOSU security camera guards your home and leaves no spot unseen with a 360° panoramic view. Enhanced AI Detection: Our advanced security camera recognizes people, vehicles, and pets—all without a subscription fee. Intelligently monitor parked cars, when someone enters the parking zone, the outside surveillance camera will send instant alerts. Our solar camera also identifies fences and walls to prevent intrusions.

Solar-Powered & Wireless: Eliminate the hassle of wired installation, this outdoor camera wireless is solar powered and backed by a high-capacity battery to keep it working in the rain or at night. With just 3 hours of direct sunlight, you'll get all-day power. Install once and enjoy forever power.

Advanced Motion Tracking ((People/Pets/Vehicles): When motion is detected, the outdoor wifi camera automatically focuses on and tracks the movement with quick pans, and tilts while recording at the same time. The spotlight can be triggered manually or motion-activated to ensure clear visibility at all times.

Customize Motion Zones & Two Way Talk: Set multiple important zones for protection and monitor what's going on whenever with dome surveillance cameras. Enable sound, light, and siren alerts for your motion sensor camera outdoor. Instant two-way talk helps communicate with delivery personnel, neighbors, or other visitors.

Smart Home Compatibiility: Easily connect via Bluetooth to stable 2.4GHz WiFi. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant. Share access permissions with family members. Local storage without charge (excluding microSD card) or cloud storage (with subscription). Access and playback anytime and anywhere via the AOSU APP.

Trustworthy Name in Security: We focus on family security and privacy protection, all images and videos are encrypted, no one can access the information without your consent. The 1-year after-sale service provides ongoing peace of mind to enjoy a premium experience for an extended period.

How does the camera perform during the night? 
Equipped with a powerful 400-lumen spotlight, our camera can illuminate the monitoring area, ensuring crystal-clear visibility and enhanced monitoring capability throughout the night. The light is motion-activated or manually switched on/off. 
Does the camera have smart features like motion detection and person recognition? 
Yes, with AI technology, when motion is detected, the camera sends real-time alerts and will auto-track the motion via tilt and pan, utilizing person, pet, and vehicle recognition technology to reduce false alarms caused by non-threatening objects. 
How does the solar-powered camera perform on cloudy days or at night? 
The camera is equipped with a built-in battery that stores excess solar energy, This battery backup feature allows the camera to continue working and capturing footage even on cloudy days, rainy days and at night. 
How easy is it to install the cameras? 
Our wireless cameras can be easily mounted on walls, ceilings, or other surfaces using the included mounting hardware, and comes with a detailed user manual. No wiring is needed. 
ls it monitored 24/7? 
Yes, this camera will be monitored throughout the day, but will only record dynamic events in the area when motion is detected, or you can manually click the Start recording button, reducing the viewing time of ineffective events.

items.text: Yes, with AI technology, when motion is detected, the camera sends real-time alerts and will auto-track the motion via tilt and pan, utilizing person, pet, and vehicle recognition technology to reduce false alarms caused by non-threatening objects.

items.name: How does the solar-powered camera perform on cloudy days or at night?
items.text: The camera is equipped with a built-in battery that stores excess solar energy, This battery backup feature allows the camera to continue working and capturing footage even on cloudy days, rainy days and at night.

items.name: How easy is it to install the cameras?
items.text: Our wireless cameras can be easily mounted on walls, ceilings, or other surfaces using the included mounting hardware, and comes with a detailed user manual. No wiring is needed.

items.name: ls it monitored 24/7?
items.text: Yes, this camera will be monitored throughout the day, but will only record dynamic events in the area when motion is detected, or you can manually click the Start recording button, reducing the viewing time of ineffective events.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers are satisfied with the camera's performance and functionality. They find it easy to set up, use, and program. The video quality is clear and detailed, with 3K resolution. Many appreciate the panoramic view, app quality, and tracking capability. However, some customers have mixed opinions on the battery life.

features: Smart Motion Tracking --- Motion tracking allows DEKCO outdoor security camera to detect object in motion. Once enabled, the security camera will start to automatically record and track object in motion. Once motion is detected, you will receive alerts directly from the app on your IOS/Android device.

Bright Floodlights and Full-Color Night Vision -- DEKCO dome surveillance cameras built-in bright floodlight function, which can display super clear images even in extremely dark environments. The floodlight camera supports infrared/full-color/auto (smart) night vision mode. Moreover, you can zoom in the picture up to 4X, and all corners are in your control. All features allow you to customize your best night vision experience.

350°Viewing Angle and Remote Monitoring -- DEKCO WIFI security camera wireless outdoor is designed with the rotation of a vertical 90 degrees and a horizontal 350 degrees; You can remote the security camera to monitor all-round without blind spots. Two-Way Audio & IP66 Weatherproof Certification -- DEKCO home security cameras with built-in microphone and speaker can establish a real time conversation between you and your visitors. 2.4GHz WiFi and Storage -- DEKCO outdoor WiFi security camera system supports 2.4GHz WiFi (not support 5GHz WiFi). The camera built-in SD card slot supports micro SD card (not included) up to 128G. title: ENSTER 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera Outdoor Wireless, 2K Solar No WiFi Security Camera with Floodlight, Spotlights, PIR Motion Sensor, Pan and Tilt, 360° Live View, Color Night Vision, SIM Card
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video Surveillance › Surveillance Cameras › Dome Cameras
features: 1. 4G LTE Cellular Connectivity: Stay connected anywhere with the ENSTER 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera. Ideal for locations without WiFi, this camera uses 4G LTE to provide continuous surveillance, ensuring your security is never compromised. It is perfect for security and remote monitoring in places like jobsite, cabins, vacation homes, farms, ranches, and wild areas.

2. Solar Powered with High Capacity Battery: Experience uninterrupted power with our solar security camera. Equipped with a high-capacity rechargeable battery(10000mAh) and a 6W solar panel, it ensures continuous operation as long as there's sunlight. Say goodbye to frequent charging and power outages.

3. Unique Floodlight with Aesthetic Appeal: Illuminate your surroundings with the ENSTER 4G LTE Security Camera's unique floodlight. This advanced feature not only provides brighter and clearer illumination but also enhances the aesthetic appeal of your property, ensuring a well-lit and visually pleasing environment.

4. 2K Color Night Vision: Capture every detail, day or night, with 2K high-resolution and advanced color night vision. The built-in floodlight and spotlights provide a brighter, clearer view, ensuring you can identify details up to 30 feet away, even in the darkest conditions.

5. 360° Pan and Tilt: Enjoy full coverage with the 360° pan and tilt feature. The camera can rotate 360° horizontally and 90° vertically, allowing you to monitor every corner of your property. Control the view remotely via the app to keep an eye on your surroundings at all times.

6. PIR Motion Detection and AI Tracking: Stay alert with advanced PIR motion detection. The camera can distinguish between humans, vehicles, and animals, reducing false alarms and sending real-time alerts to your phone.

7. Two-Way Audio and Siren Alarm: Communicate directly through the camera with the built-in microphone and speaker. Use the two-way audio to talk to visitors or warn intruders. The siren alarm can be triggered remotely to deter unwanted guests, providing an extra layer of security.

8. Include SIM Card and Flexible Storage: The camera comes with a 3-in-1 SIM card, offering seamless connectivity with major US networks. It supports memory card(not included) up to 128GB. Enjoy flexible storage options with a 30-day free trial of cloud storage, ensuring your footage is always accessible.

9. IP66 Weatherproof Design: Built to withstand harsh weather conditions, the ENSTER 4G LTE Security Camera is IP66 weatherproof. Whether it's rain, snow, or extreme heat, this camera is designed to operate in various environments, making it perfect for outdoor use on farms, construction sites, and remote locations.

10. Easy to Setup and Sharing & Detachable Stand: Simple ways to setup the camera, you can access the camera anytime and anywhere on your phone to check what’s going on and share the live view simultaneously with your families. Install the bracket separately, then snap the monitor to the bracket. If you only want to remove the monitor temporarily, there is no need to remove the bracket, just pull the monitor right out.

breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Digital Cameras › Point & Shoot Digital Cameras
features: 【Latest 5K Digital Camera, 58mm UV Filter】Experience the ultimate in photography with this 5K 30-FPS smart video camera, boasting a high resolution of 5120 x 2880 pixels and an impressive 48MP image resolution. Perfect for capturing stunning landscapes or creating engaging vlogs, say goodbye to blurry visuals with this 5k vlogging camera! The included 58mm UV filter helps absorb ultraviolet light, reducing the bluish cast of daylight and protecting the lens from dust, moisture, and scratches.

【WIFI Connection, HDMI Output Digital Camera】Zheozeig US first 5K point-and-shoot digital camera with WiFi connectivity. This feature allows you to wirelessly connect your 3.5" IPS screen camera to your phone, tablet, computer, or printer. Effortlessly share photos and videos directly to social media, email, or cloud storage without needing a computer. For high-quality live streaming, connect the camera to streaming devices via HDMI, making it perfect for online events, conferences, and shows.

【AutoFocus Camera for Photography, 16X Digital Zoom】The compact digital camera comes with a powerful focusing function. Its autofocus system quickly and accurately locks onto subjects even in low-light environments, ensuring sharp images and videos for YouTube vlogging. The 16x zoom capability allows you to easily zoom in or out while recording videos or taking still images using the W/T button. The 5K camera is an ideal choice for travel, camping, hiking, or capturing social and family moments.

【Updated 6-Axis Anti-Shake, Webcam Camera】Unlike traditional 2- or 3-axis stabilization, the upgraded 6-axis anti-shake mini vlogging camera stabilizes across pitch, yaw, roll, and three linear axes (x, y, z), offers greater versatility in shooting angles and positions, allows longer exposure times without blurry. The 5K video camera can double as a webcam. Connect it to a computer via USB and select PC digital camera mode for online teaching, video calls, and live streaming on TikTok/YouTube.

【Multi-Mode Features, A Perfect Choice】zheozeig US vlog camera offers features like flash, continuous shooting, time-lapse, slow motion, face detection, and video pause function. The mini 5K digital camera (4.9 x 2.5 x 3.3 inches, 0.59 lb) is an ideal choice for Valentine's Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, or birthdays for lovers, friends, children, or parents. If you encounter any issues while using this rechargeable video camera, please contact us without hesitaion, and we will respond within 12 hours.

title: AOSU 2K Solar Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, Solar Outside Camera for Home Security, WiFi Camera with Color Night Vision, PIR Human Detection, 2-Way Talk, IP66 Waterproof, HomeBase not Compatible
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video Surveillance › Surveillance Cameras › Bullet Cameras
features: 【Forever Power】100% Wire-free Surveillance. Daily direct sunlight is enough to power the AOSU wireless camera continuously, so you never have to change the battery regularly. And the rechargeable battery keeps the juice flowing when the sun sets or is cloudy. 100% Wireless and IP66 Weatherproof, makes the installation fast and easy, providing higher installation flexibility. (❗NOTE: This camera is NOT compatible with the AOSU Homebase.)

【Clearer Details】AOSU solar security camera has a 2K resolution, which is 50% higher than 1080P picture quality. The outdoor camera has a built-in spotlight, provides excellent night vision, and guards your home day and night.

【Securer Smart Alarms】AOSU home security cameras equipped with advanced PIR motion sensors and motion analysis technology, more intelligent notifications will be sent to your phone, such as ''there is motion'', ''someone is passing by'', or ''someone is staying''. The notifications come with an event preview which helps you to quickly respond. The optional alarm zones allow you to only monitor the areas you care about.

【Drive Away Intruders】AOSU outside security camera has a built-in 2-way voice and spotlight, which can turn on the light immediately after detecting a thief, and send a warning to drive away the thief and protect your property safety.

【Record with No Subscription Fee】Videos can be securely stored locally on a micro SD card (not included). A micro SD card with the specification "8-128GB, format FAT32, Class10" is suggested. Cloud storage provides a 7-day free trial. You can access and playback anytime and anywhere via AOSU APP. No subscription fee for the supported functions. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant.

Does this solar-powered security camera support connection to the AOSU Homebase? 
No, this camera is not compatible with the AOSU Solar camera kit with Homebase. It works on Wifi alone. 
Does the wireless security camera support 24/7 continuous recording? 
No, this solar security camera does not support 24/7 continuous recording, it only records when the cameras detect movements. 
What are the specifications for a micro SD card used for local storage? 
A camera-specific micro SD card with specifications of "8-128GB, format FAT32, Class10" is suggested. Or you will be prompted the SD Card is not suported and need to be formatted. Please pull out the card and use a computer to format it into FAT32. 
Does the camera support 5Ghz Wifi? 
No, the camera does not support 5Ghz WiFi. At outdoors 2.4G WiFi has a stronger connection through walls than 5G WiFi. 
Does this wireless outdoor camera support RTSP/ONVIF/NVR/FTP? 
Not support RTSP / ONVIF / NVR / FTP, only support SD card and cloud storage.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
64MP Front Camera 
Designed to elevate your photography experience 

Whether you're capturing stunning selfies, vlogging, or shooting family moments, this front camera delivers exceptional detail, sharpness, and vibrant colors. Its high-resolution sensor ensures that every shot is crisp, even in low-light conditions, allowing for flawless images at any time of day. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
4K Video Shooting 
Experience the world in stunning detail with 4K video shooting feature 

The 4K video mode is designed with ease in mind, making it perfect for both beginners and enthusiasts. With smooth frame rates and advanced stabilization, even fast-moving subjects or handheld shots appear professional and steady. Create cinematic videos that are perfect for sharing, editing, or reliving those precious moments, all with NINIVISION’s 4K video power. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Make it closer 
Unlock the power of close-up photography 

Unlock the power of close-up photography with NINIVISION’s 16X digital zoom. This feature allows you to zoom in on distant subjects without losing clarity or detail, making it perfect for capturing far-off landscapes, wildlife, or candid moments from afar. Whether you're shooting videos or photos, the 16X zoom ensures that you get a closer view without having to physically move closer. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Built-in Flash 
Light Up Every Moment with Precision! 

Illuminate your shots with NINIVISION's built-in flash function, perfect for capturing crisp, clear images in low-light conditions. Whether you're shooting indoors, at night, or in tricky lighting, the flash ensures your subjects are well-lit and vibrant, adding depth and detail to every photo. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
20 Filters 
Transform Every Shot with Creative Flair! 

Unleash your creativity with NINIVISION's 20 built-in filters, designed to enhance your photography with just a click. Whether you're going for a vintage vibe, a moody monochrome look, or a vibrant pop of color, these versatile filters allow you to effortlessly transform your images to match your style and vision. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Slow Motion 
Capture Every Second in Stunning Detail! 

Perfect for highlighting action-packed moments, the slow-motion mode lets you film at high frame rates, allowing you to slow down your footage without sacrificing smoothness or detail. Whether you're shooting sports, wildlife, or dynamic everyday moments, slow-motion adds a dramatic, cinematic touch to your videos.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description

About Cloarks 
We are dedicated to manufacturing high-quality and technologically advanced indoor security cameras. Our focus is to provide you with dependable and easy-to-use products that prioritize safety and convenience. We strive to share the benefits of security and convenience with you through our reliable range of items. 
Pan/Tilt WiFi Indoor Baby/Pet Security Camera 
360°Coverage, 2K FHD, 24/7 Live Stream, AI Motion Tracking, Instant Alerts, Color Night Vision, Two-Way Audio, One-Click Call and Cloud/TF Storage 
The indoor camera can smartly rotate 355° horizontally and 90° vertically, providing complete 360° coverage for your baby and pet. It captures everything, ensuring that you never miss a moment and giving your home continuous 24-hour protection, providing peace of mind. 
Remote monitoring your baby/pet/house and 24/7 live video 
2K FHD image, video and color night vision, providing a super clear vision even at night 
AI motion detection, it can recognize person and pet by AI technical. Customize activity zones, custom monitor multiple specified areas 
Smart pan/tilt rotation and 360° coverage, you will never miss anything 
Multiple users sharing, you can share this security camera with globally users 
Instant alerts, push a real-time notification to you phone app once tracking motion. Support cloud and TF card storage 
Two-way talk, you can communicate in real-time with your family, baby, pet, and even warn off and drive away thieves via your phone app 
One-click call,you can initiate active communication with the person on the other side of the mobile app, directly through the camera 
2K FHD 24/7 Live Stream and Smart Pan/Tilt 
This baby/pet camera comes with 2K image, live video and video playback, allowing you to observe your baby or pet from anywhere at any time. 
When motion is detected, the camera will auto-rotate to track the movement, ensuring comprehensive 360° coverage. You won't miss any important notifications or events. 
AI People and Pet Motion Detection 
The cameras for home security are equipped with advanced AI technology, enabling easy identification of people and pets. This security camera will send a real-time notification to you phone app if the motion is detected. 
Multiple Users Sharing 
The home security cameras allow for multiple users to access the live video feed simultaneously from anywhere around the globe. You can protect your home and share the live video with your family and friends. 
Two-Way Audio and One-Click Call 
This security camera indoor wireless supports real-time, two-way audio calls. You can communicate in real-time with your family, baby, pet, and even deter and scare away intruders using your phone app, regardless of your location. 
With just one click, you can actively engage in communication with the person on the other side of the mobile app. 
Color Night Vision and Instant Alerts 
This indoor camera offers both full color night vision and infrared night vision. You can enjoy clear, full color night vision even in low-light conditions. 
This security camera will activate a siren alarm and push a real-time notification to your phone app once it detecting unusual motion. This alert will deter and drive away thieves. Additionally, and you can directly warn off thieves by 2-way audio feature. 
Customize Activity Areas 
You can demarcate and customize specific areas that you want to monitor and observe, so reduce the unnecessary notifications push to your phone, allows you to focus your attention on the designated areas of interest.

title: Tapo TP-Link 2K QHD Security Camera, Indoor/Outdoor, 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰 𝗣𝗖𝗠𝗮𝗴 𝗘𝗱𝗶𝘁𝗼𝗿'𝘀 𝗖𝗵𝗼𝗶𝗰𝗲, Color Night Vision, Free Person/Pet/Vehicle Detection, Invisible IR Mode, SD Storage, C120
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video Surveillance › Surveillance Cameras › Bullet Cameras
description: If you are looking for a compact, feature packed, versatile camera solution, the Tapo C120 is the ideal camera for you. The camera includes premium features at no additional cost, such as its free person/pet/vehicle detection, powered by AI processing as well as a suite of other features including full duplex two-way audio, Alexa and Google compatibility and light and sound alarms. Monitor where you want with custom monitoring zones and add additional privacy with privacy zones. The camera image sensor is 1/29.'' progressive scan CMOS starlight sensor. The camera lens focal length is 3.17 mm and has a 1.65 aperture. The camera field of view is 120° diagonal, 103° horizontal, and 55° vertical. The night vision is 850 nm IR LED (30 ft / 9 m), 940 nm IR LED (30 ft / 9 m). The camera has full color night vision. The camera frame rate is 20 fps (self-adaptive according to brightness). The camera's digital zoom is 12x. The camera's video compression is H.264. The camera has a live view. The image enhancement features 3K DNR and WDR. This camera has two-way audio with noise cancellation. The siren level is 96dB (level measured at 4-inch/10-cm distance). This camera's AI detections include motion detection, person detection, line-crossing detection, baby cry detection, vehicle detection, pet detection, meow detection, bark detection, and glass-breaking detection. This camera supports the 802.11b/g/n protocol. The wireless rates are as follows: 11 Mbps (802.11 b), 54 Mbps (802.11 g), 72.2 Mbps (802.11n). Wireless security includes WPA, WPA2-PSK. The security features include 128-bit AES encryption with SSL/TLS and on-device machine learning. The packaging contents include 1 Tapo C120 Camera, 1 5.0 V, 1.0 A power adapter, 3m (9.84ft) Type-C wire, 4 mounting anchors, 4 mounting screws, 2 cable organizers, 1 mounting template, 1 iron camera base, 3M adhesive, detaching pin, 1 quick start guide.
features: 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟒 𝐏𝐂𝐌𝐚𝐠 𝐄𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐨𝐫’𝐬 𝐂𝐡𝐨𝐢𝐜𝐞: Praised for its outstanding value, delivering sharp 2K resolution and a comprehensive feature set.
𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐭, 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐞, 𝐖𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐨𝐟: The Tapo C120 is a compact camera suitable for indoor and outdoor use, featuring an IP66 rating for withstanding rain, dust, and rugged conditions.
𝐌𝐚𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐁𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐅𝐥𝐞𝐱𝐢𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐌𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠: Easily attach the C120 camera to any metal surface with its magnetic base. Versatile mounting on railings, frames, or even the refrigerator.
𝟐𝐊 𝐐𝐇𝐃 𝟒𝐌𝐏 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Crystal-clear detail in every shot. Capture every moment with stunning 2K quality that ensures even the finest details are never missed.
𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐫 𝐍𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧: The built-in Starlight sensor delivers bright, colorful video at night, with two spotlights for extra illumination in darker conditions.
𝐈𝐧𝐯𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐈𝐑 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞: Get night vision up to 30ft with IR light. If the red light is distracting, switch to invisible mode for discreet monitoring.
𝐍𝐨-𝐂𝐨𝐬𝐭 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐨𝐧/𝐏𝐞𝐭/𝐕𝐞𝐡𝐢𝐜𝐥𝐞 𝐃𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: The Tapo C120 uses AI to detect people, pets, or vehicles for free. Customize alerts to focus on specific objects and reduce notifications
𝐅𝐮𝐥𝐥 𝐃𝐮𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐱 𝟐-𝐖𝐚𝐲 𝐀𝐮𝐝𝐢𝐨: Talk in real time, just like a phone call, for smooth communication with delivery personnel, kids, pets, and more.
𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐨𝐫 𝐂𝐥𝐨𝐮𝐝 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞: Store recordings on a MicroSD card up to 512GB (not included) or via the Tapo Care Cloud subscription. [Check TP-Link FAQ for MicroSD compatibility before purchase.]

title: Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 12 Purple Holiday Bundle 2024
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Film Photography › Film Cameras › Instant Cameras
description: The super bubbly INSTAX MINI 12™ instant camera Holiday Bundle is bursting with joy, creativity and color. Not only is this iconic instant camera available in a super fun bundle, it’s fully loaded with easy-to-use modes and controls. Designed to keep up with life, the INSTAX MINI 12™ instant camera is ready to go with a simple twist of the lens. Twist again and you’re in Close-up mode, perfect for selfies. Combined with the perfectly positioned selfie mirror, automatic flash control and INSTAX MINI instant photos, the INSTAX MINI 12 instant camera is a selfie extraordinaire. But that’s not all the Close-up mode can do. When activated, the viewfinder neatly pairs up with the lens, so what you see is what you get – no object shifts in your final INSTAX photo! (FYI the fancy term for this is parallax correction.) Because when you’re this close, there’s no room for error. Plus, with automatic exposure, you can simply aim and click. No need to adjust any settings, just simply fun photos every time. And with that in mind, once you have snapped, your INSTAX MINI instant photo will eject in approximately five seconds (development time thereafter is approximately 90 seconds). All without compromising on image quality. That deserves high fives all around. When you’re finished capturing memories, twist the lens again to turn the INSTAX MINI 12 instant camera off. But the fun doesn’t end there. Download the free INSTAX UP!™ App to your Smartphone for a new way to keep all your INSTAX photos digitally, in one place. All you have to do is use the INSTAX UP! App and your Smartphone to scan your printed INSTAX photos and they’ll be turned into sharable, digital photos that you can edit, tag and save. Ready to twist & go? Get the most out of your INSTAX MINI 12 instant camera with these great accessories included in the bundle. Bundle Includes one 10 pack of INSTAX MINI white border instant film to capture lasting memories, one 20pk INSTAX MINI film border stickers, an INSTAX MINI Photo Album to hold up to 64 prints of your INSTAX MINI precious moments, INSTAX Faux Fur Drawstring Pouch that conveniently holds a Mini 12 camera & pack of film and an INSTAX Photo Idea Booklet to let your imagination run wild with creative projects to create using printed INSTAX photos.
features: Compact and cute design. Easily twist the lens to turn on and off
Built-in selfie mirror for easy selfies Close-up mode with parallax correction
Features automatic exposure and flash control for bright photos that are not “washed-out”
Prints out high-quality, 2” x 3” INSTAX MINI instant photos in approximately five seconds (Development time thereafter is approximately 90 seconds).

Mini 12 Bundle Includes: 1 10pk Instax Mini instant print film, 20 Instax Mini frame stickers, Instax Mini Printed Photo Album - holds up to 64 Instax Mini photos, Faux Fur Drawstring Pouch, and Instax Photo Idea Booklet

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers appreciate the camera's quality, accessories, and ease of use. They find it easy to use, even for beginners, and a great gift idea. The camera captures vibrant shots every time with clear resolution. It comes with a protective cover, film, and a picture album, which customers appreciate. Customers also mention that the product is nostalgic and retro-looking, providing good value for money.

title: Video Camera YouTube Vlogging Camera Recorder FHD 1080P 24.0MP 3.0 Inch 270 Degree Rotation Screen 16X Digital Zoom Camcorder with Microphone,Remote Control and 2 Batteries
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Video › Camcorders
features: Video Camera Camcorder: With 8 mega pixel CMOS image sensor it records 30fps movies in 1080p and 60fps in 720p resolution. You can capture vibrant and extremely realistic images; Ideal choice for amateurs and beginners to take selfies and start filming.

Camcorder with Microphone and Remote: This camcorder has built-in and external microphone. The external microphone enhances sound recording volume and reduces noise. It comes with a remote control,no one will miss any precious moment.

Multifunctional Camcorder: The camcorder supports face detect, smile capture, anti shake, data stamp, playback modes, TV output, and pause function etc. With the pause function, you can pause the video when you need to convert the scene without reopening a new file, which makes it easier for you to upload and edit your videos.

Webcam Video Camera: You can use this function for video chatting or live streaming. By connecting the computer with a USB cable, then choose the PC CAM mode as a webcam.( Please download the software AMCAP before using the PC CAM function)
Recording While Charging: The video camera comes with 2 3.7V 1500mAh batteries, and it supports recording while charging. If you have any question or suggestion, please directly message us.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Warm Tips: 
Please format the memory card through this camera when you first use the camera.(The card is Not included, need to purchase sepatately)
The camera supports SD memory card and MMC card. (4GB to 128GB)
Please carefully read the user manual before use. The camera is design for amateurs, not for Professional users.
The camcorder doesn't support manual focus, the lens is fixed. Please confirm the focusing distance is 1.5 meters or more. If you need close-up shots, please use a macro lens and keeping 10-20 cm distance from the object.
270 Degree Rotation & 3" IPS LCD Screen 
The video camera camorder with a 3'' IPS 270 degree rotation lcd screen. Easily shoot great images by viewing the screen. 
Time-Lapse Recording 
The time-lapse function allows you record the slow process of plant growth or sunrise and sunset. 
16X Digital Zoom & Pause function 
Pause the video when you need to convert the scene without reopening a new file, which makes it easier for you to upload and edit your videos. 
Video Camera Specifications: 
Image Resolution: 	24M(5600×4200); 20M(5200×3900); 16M(4608×3456); 12M(4000×3000); 10M(3648×2736); 7M-Wide(3648×2048 HD); 5M(2592×1944);3M(2048×1536); 2M-Wide(1920×1080 HD) 	
Video Resolution: 	1920*1080P(FHD)/30FPS, 1280*720(HD)/30FPS, 640*480

Video Format: 	AVI 	
Digital Zoom: 	Max. 16X 	
Remote Control: 	Supported

White Balance: 	Auto/Daylight/Cloudy/Fluorescent /Tungsten 	
Exposure Compensation: 	-3.0 ~ +3.0 	
Operation Mode: 	Video/Photo/Playback. 	
Operating System Requirement 	Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Mac 10.2 	
Focal Distance:f=8.15mm 	Aperture:F/3.0 	
Auto Off: 	3mins /5mins /10mins /OFF 	
Webcam Video Camera & HD Output 
You can use this function for video chatting or live streaming. By connecting the computer with a USB cable, then choose the PC CAM mode as a webcam. (Please download the software AMCAP before using the PC CAM function) 
You can output the files of camcorder by the cable comes with the package, playback the unforgetable memories taken by camera through remote control with TV.

title: 64MP 5K Digital Camera for Photography, Vlogging Cameras for YouTube with 3” Flip Screen,16X Digital Zoom, WiFi& Autofocus,2 Batteries, 32GB TF Card(S200,Black)
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Digital Cameras › Point & Shoot Digital Cameras
features: 📷[64MP&5K Digital Camera] Our cameras provide further integrated solutions for photographers. With its high-resolution 64-megapixel sensor, camera can capture detailed images with rich colors and contrast. With its flipped 3-inch IPS screen and 5k video resolution, this video camera smoothly producess stabilized HD video. In short, our vlogging cameras will be ideal for both photography and video recording!

📷[16X Free Digital Zoom &Autofocus] Our Point Shoot Digital Cameras features 16X zoom and autofocus,offering endless possibilities for your photography!The freely controllable 16X digital zoom supports you to take detailed close-ups shot, regardless of distance. Autofocus function will make it easy for photographers to focus on capturing moving moments.Besides，Our cameras offer more customisation options for Beginner Photography, and you can easily adjust the flash, ISO, and other settings to meet your need

📽️[Versatile 5K Vlogging cameras for Youtube] With many video/shooting modes,this 5K vlogging camera for YouTube is suitable as vlog production tools and multipurpose cameras,such as Time-lapse & continuous shooting,fast & slow motiom,ect.The included microphone will also be more convenient for you to receive audio.Those make your videos and new career more unique.Two rechargeable batteries and battery charge help you vlogging without worrying the power supply.

💻[PC camera option & HDMI output] We've also designed our digital cameras to be convenient for transferring. You can use the USB port to link to your PC and use our camera as a webcam; or you can use WiFi and APP to transfer your data to your mobile phone; and you can also use the HIDM port to play the videos you take on a larger screen. Convenient and efficient linking methods will bring more convenience and help you save and edit your favorite videos.

🎁[Accessories& Gifts] We offer a wide range of accessories for camera kits.This digital camera is very suitable for entry-level users and is a perfect gift for beginners.If you have any questions, please contact us without hesitation. We offer free replacement and refund service for three months.
